title: Amber Heard is Innocent 3 - Aquaman News, Melissa Benoist, & Change Culture (Documentary)
description:
Amber Heard is joining Aquaman for 2021 filming! As Amber and Melissa Benoist of Supergirl speak out against domestic abuse, we should change culture both in society and online. Amber's life continues to be threatened despite her evidence.

See "Amber Heard is Innocent" in domestic violence from Johnny Depp, documentary part 3: https://youtu.be/a5F6nU_0WO4

Here is our summary:

Amber only wanted to move on with her life, such as to be Mera of Aquaman and to do humanitarian work for the United Nations, ACLU, refugees, World Identity Network SDG 16, Amnesty International, and causes for Human Rights.

Amber Heard experienced choking, kicking, headbutting, over a dozen physically violent fights, bruising, pushing, abuse, loss of confidence, death threats, coercive control, and loss of physical health from Depp. She feared for her life. We show her side...

It's been nearly 7 years since the first violent experience, yet the abuse continues...

Crowdfunding and modern 21st century online manipulation is used against her, as if she's a political adversary of her ex-husband and his alliances.

Witnesses such as her sister Whitney saw the physical violence, and witnesses such as Melanie Inglessis who saw injuries are intimidated to not give testimonies or are coerced, such as Laura Divenere who worked for Elon Musk. Musk had offered 24/7 security to Amber (see page 139 of NGN's closing submissions).

Harassment is done by Depp's agents, paid tabloids, and online simulations.

Forces work against her, such as Adam Waldman who worked for Russian Oligarch Deripaska, to use social media against her while threatening reporters such as a New York Times one on 'national security', supporters, businesses like Warner Bros and L'Oreal, and witnesses.

Adam Waldman's Twitter account only follows the Dali Llama, and originally had no photo, then added a photo closer to the July 2020 UK NGN trial.

Swayed by false commentary and online tip jars, even reporter Nick Wallis removed evidence on Amber's side, such as the recording included (13:33) of Divenere telling Amber she was intimidated by Waldman with being deposed, $20,000 in lawyer fees, and leading questions to coerce her.

Messages are included from an anonymous source stating she was a partner of ex-staff in March 29 and April 2019, stating that Waldman and Depp's team wanted her done.

Staff knew Amber was injured repeatedly and were on NDAs.

Melissa Benoist's story and Amber Heard's draw parallels, with injuries from phones, choking, isolation, and hiding abuse.

Melissa states a friend was the first to ask her about abuse and supported her. "I Stand With Melissa" went well since November 2019. Both are part of the DC universe and star as superheroes..

But Melissa's ex is not a millionaire starring in over 200 movies. Nor does she need to worry about Depp's circle, criminals including 3-time felony 'minion' Ryan Leone who will do anything for Depp's attention or to incite his followers, or high profile individuals. Online simulations don't target Melissa with hate. Melissa's support comes after Amber's suffering.

Scenes from Monica Lewinsky's TEDx talk "The Price of Shame," Hate Lab (http://hatelab.net), Anti-Defamation League's Backspace Hate campaign, Prime Minister Julia Gillard's reference to 'ditch the witch' billboards, Bruce Hickey's scene about true journalism from The Buzz pilot, and screenshots of Waldman with Deripaska at a party in Austria provide background with context of our times.

"Would you save her?" is a video showing that only one man stopped to help in their social experiment demonstrating kidnapping a woman in Los Angeles.

The next time you see something, you should do something!

You could save a life!

It's long been known that Amber would win her legal cases...

Melissa Benoist encourages people to help friends enduring domestic abuse, and Amber Heard encourages people to work on human rights. It does change lives.

Some Videos included:

  • Amber Heard's Friend (IO Tillet who saw her injuries and heard her scream) Who Called 911 Speaks Out: https://youtu.be/Ur0wcLV10V8
  • Amber Heard Anonymous 911 Call: https://youtu.be/Cgkn4waCUtk
  • Recording of Laura Divenere being coerced by Adam Waldman: https://youtu.be/CunBOnfsDBE
  • Recording of Depp saying he headbutt Amber as she screamed: https://youtu.be/zMAYCFPu-XQ
  • World Identity Network: https://youtu.be/70XVyFd6TlY
  • Amber Heard 'Why Be a Human Rights Activist?' | Hague Talks: https://youtu.be/6765YsE_aIA

More Links:

  • Transcript of Coercion of Laura Divenere: https://assets.documentcloud.org/documents/6811708/Laura.pdf
  • Adam Waldman met with Oleg Deripaska: https://www.proekt.media/en/article-en/adam-waldman-eng/
  • ‘Supergirl’ Star Melissa Benoist: https://www.thegeekbuzz.com/news/supergirl-star-melissa-benoist-survivor-domestic-violence/

Thanks for everyone who has seen this appeal, shared, and signed it!

It's a long road, but supporting Amber Heard has changed our lives!

You make a difference!

We cannot wait to see Amber Heard win in these delayed cases and start filming on Aquaman 2!

We'll continue to change culture!

More information:

  • We linked to BrightAct.org which is supported by the Sweden government, EUvsVirus, and European Innovation Council towards the end of the front page of this appeal to show that they encourage and want women to collect data with photos, reports, videos, and recordings.
  • Amber Heard did what she should have to protect herself with collecting evidence, especially with the numerous death threats that her ex gave her, and is still giving to her de facto through his followers or by coercing her through his media manipulation.
  • She did this before culture (or public affairs) caught up.
  • SaveMeNow App is linked as the 'equal and safe technology' we support because, as the 911 calls were sensationalized, it shows that 911 isn't even connected to real-time data, location, text, or applications. They don't even know where callers are, when help is arriving, or when help is there! 
  • We won't ever 'rationalize' abuse or deaths of women.

We hope that her innocence is revealed soon via a verdict, and it's wrong to continually draw out these cases to make Amber suffer - it's politically and socioculturally orientated.

Our petition is about public safety to save lives.

We support Amber and she's a Champion!

title: Stop Abuse: More Evidence, Amber Heard's Counterclaim vs Cyberabuse & Adam Waldman - Change Culture!
description:
We support Amber Heard's Counterclaim Against Cyberabuse & Adam Waldman, who attacks reporters and witnesses supporting Amber online.

Here are more evidence and facts of this abusive, deadly, and enabled situation that is to create violence against women and leaders like Amber Heard who try to bring awareness - even to the United Nations General Assembly.

What you should know - background:

  • Ellen Barkin is an ex of Johnny Depp and made a deposition statement supporting Amber Heard for her Virginia, USA case. She wrote online that they only care about women after they are dead, after she re-posted an article about Amber. "And we never will be...unless we're dead."
  • Kate Moss was found crouched in a corner after police were called when Depp was destroying his hotel room. Staff members believe he pushed Kate and that staff would walk away.
  • Witnesses in the trial speaking for Depp may be paid $100,000 as patrons of Depp, receive free housing, free jet plane rides, food, events, and followers who will even create accounts to support them. Even a 3-time felon can stay on Twitter, but AmberHeard Italia and other pages can be hacked.
  • Amber grew up in a violent household, where her mother stayed with her father despite this. To Amber Heard, as shown in this video about 'splitting', marriage and relationships are long-term, even with violence.
  • Elon Musk offered 24/7 security to Amber Heard when she wanted a restraining order against Johnny Depp. Texts show she had mentioned violence to Musk prior to this escalation.

In this video posted on Motivator Network, which is hardly seen of course:

Amber Heard's Side (Audio Leak 1) Domestic Violence with Johnny Depp (2015). The yelling led to 3 Physical Fights in 1-2 months (0:34), screaming led to Escalating Fights including possibility of a Crime Scene (2:37) and getting Killed (4:00). She was Kicked, Kicked, and Kicked (2:06). There was a Physical Fight on their honeymoon (1:15), and a fight in San Francisco (1:32)...

Tabloids try to frame it so that the public would rationalize Amber's death if it escalated. Don't enable violence against women.

Read this article from The Geek Buzz surrounding the background of Amber Heard's counterclaim, that includes Adam Waldman, Deripaska, and attacks against female leadership, "Amber Heard, Johnny Depp and The Cyrillic Russian Spiders From Mars."

The video attached is of Amber Heard speaking on behalf of businesswoman Marsha Lazareva, who was falsely set up by powerful players in the Middle East, for the United Nations. Cherie Blair and Neil Bush have supported freeing Marsha. Cherie Blair continuously supports Amber Heard, according to reports, and a more safe, equal world.

As seen in the NGN trial, we saw there were at least 14 physical altercations, and though not all were recorded, Amber Heard did her best to document the abuse she experienced.

Depp was recorded admitting to headbutting her during that physical fight that left her unconscious, nearly suffocated by being pushed into a pillow, and waking up to see her blood on her pillow. It was an escalation that made her fear for her life and months later led to IO calling 911.

According to Amber, Depp threatened to kill her, and it's collaborated motive with homicidal ideation texts with actor Bettany - who has made false statements in support of Depp. Collusion is very damaging, and witnesses may be speaking for Depp because of the collusion. 

For many months this 2020, Adam Waldman has used a strange account on Twitter that originally had no profile photo or banner, with it attacking a New York Times reporter, referring to her as a "national security" reporter among other reporters who write anything beneficial to Amber Heard or even when they write without bias.

It only follows the Dali Llama. If you understand social engineering online, you may have thought this account was fake.

Then later closer to the NGN trial, he added a dark profile photo wearing black clothing.

Parts of the Counterclaim from Amber Heard against Cyberabuse refers specifically to Adam R. Waldman, licensed by the Washington DC bar and who previously worked for Oligarch Billionaire Deripaska, who was accused of organized crime and knowing about election interference.

Counterclaim in the Circuit Court of Fairfax County, Virgina: CL-2019-0002911 from Amber Laura Heard against John C. Depp II.

Counterclaim CL-2019-0002911: 

"1.                  As part of his ongoing smear campaign, Mr. Depp and/or his agents acting on his behalf have directed both authentic and inauthentic social media accounts, and/or non-human controlled “bots,” to target Ms. Heard’s Twitter account and attempt to interfere with her contracts and/or business expectancies. In particular, many of these accounts both smear and harass Ms. Heard while simultaneously promoting and praising Mr. Depp’s agent and attorney, Adam Waldman. The talking points in these accounts are strikingly similar but use slightly different text and content to evade Twitter’s anti-spam and platform manipulation guideline, which bars harassing, abusive, and intimidating behavior except “when viewed in the context of a larger conversation.” A herd mentality helps mask predatory behavior.
2.                  There are a number of newly created foreign language accounts specifically or predominantly designed to damage Ms. Heard. Many of these accounts have Cyrillic signatures, reflecting Russian origin. Mr. Waldman, Mr. Depp’s agent and attorney, is publicly  associated with Russian individuals with the capability to organize such attacks.

3.                  Two accounts, IFOD NET and MY GRINDELWALD, are responsible for approximately 50% of the targeted attacks on Ms. Heard. The MYGRINDELWALD account uses its platform to amplify anti-Heard hashtags and false information being disseminated about Ms. Heard. It has also amplified the change.org petitions described above, repeating calls for  Ms. Heard to lose contracts or business expectancies. And, as evidence of its origin, it routinely tweets the statements of Mr. Depp’s agent and attorney, Mr. Waldman, on a near-daily basis and often praises the otherwise unknown attorney, even going so far as to say “i love you waldman!!”

4.                  In total, there are at least dozens if not hundreds of inauthentic accounts that impugn Ms. Heard while praising Mr. Waldman. This messaging further evidences the origin of Mr. Depp’s unlawful campaign and demonstrates that these inauthentic accounts are actively coordinating content to manipulate the Twitter platform and avoid detection....

1.                   Mr. Depp, through his agents and attorneys in Virginia, including specifically Waldman, have engaged in a campaign to harass and damages Ms. Heard through the use of computers and computer accessible vehicles.

 1.                  This campaign of harassment is consistent with comments Mr. Depp made to friends regarding his intentions to ruin Ms. Heard’s career, or worse. For example, in 2013, Mr. Depp texted his friend, actor Paul Bettany, the following: “Let’s burn Amber.” The same day, he texted Bettany again with plans to murder her: “Let’s drown her before we bum  her!!! I will f-k her burnt corpse afterwards to make sure she is dead.”

1.                  This conduct also has the potential effect of polluting  the jury  pool  who will decide the actual issues in dispute in this lawsuit.

2.                  Mr. Depp, through his agents and attorneys, has also attempted to intimidate and threaten witnesses to attempt to influence their testimony in a manner adverse to Ms. Heard, claiming that they will have to spend significant sums for attorneys if they do not cooperate and sign declarations prepared by Waldman, suggesting that without their cooperation people will be arrested and charged with crimes, and the like....

1.                  Depp’s defamation and harassment of Ms. Heard did not stop when he filed this lawsuit. In fact, it has continued though the present, as Depp has authorized and  conspired  with his attorney, Adam Waldman (acting on Depp’s behalf), to attempt to destroy and defame Ms. Heard in the press, accusing her of being a serial liar who created the abuse she endured from Depp, which is not true.

2.                  On April 12, 2019, Depp, through Waldman, accused Ms. Heard of committing “defamation, perjury and filing and receiving a fraudulent temporary restraining  order demand with the court” falsely accusing Ms. Heard of not being attacked by Depp. Exhibit B.

3.                   Depp, through Waldman, continued to defame Ms. Heard in June 2019, stating to Blast that “Ms. Heard continues to defraud her abused hoax victim Mr. Depp, the #metoo movement she masquerades as the leader of, and other real abuse victims worldwide.” Exhibit C.

1.                  On July 2, 2019, Depp, through Waldman, told Blast that Ms. Heard, “went to court with painted on ‘bruises’ to obtain a Temporary Restraining Order on May 27.” Exhibit D. The next day, Waldman continued Depp’s defamation of Ms. Heard when he stated to People magazine that “Ms. Heard’s ‘battered face’ was a hoax.” Exhibit E.

2.                  Depp, through Waldman, continued to claim that Ms. Heard was committing perjury to the Daily Mail, when he stated on April 8, 2020 that “Amber Heard and her friends in the media use fake sexual violence allegations as both a sword and shield, depending on their needs. They have selected some of her sexual violence hoax ‘facts’ as the sword, inflicting  them on the public and Mr. Depp.” Exhibit F.

3.                  Then on April 27, 2020, Depp, through Waldman, again told the Daily Mail that “Quite simply this was an ambush, a hoax. They set Mr. Depp up by calling the cops but the first attempt didn’t do the trick. The officers came to the penthouses, thoroughly searched and interviewed, and left after seeing no damage to face or property.  So Amber and her friends spilled a little wine and roughed the place up, got their stories straight under the direction of a lawyer and publicist, and then placed a second call to 911.” Exhibit G.

4.                  On June, 24, 2020, Depp, through Waldman, falsely accused Ms. Heard in the Daily Mail of committing an “abuse hoax” against Depp. Exhibit H.

5.                  On July 22, 2020, Depp, through Waldman, tweeted the following with a picture:

This photo was taken March 23, 2013 ONE DAY AFTER Ms. Heard alleges Johnny Depp backhanded her in the face with heavy rings on his fingers.

6.                   On July 26, 2020, Depp, through Waldman tweeted the following with the same pictures:

Nice Photo taken March 24, 2013 one day after she [Ms. Heard] claimed Johnny smashed her in the face with heavily ringed fingers. Confronted, Amber testified she sees swelling in the pie. Whitney then testified she sees swelling and a SPLIT LIP. Do you Believe[sic] them or your own lying eyes?

1.                  These tweets contained false and defamatory information, including the date of the picture.

2.                  This elaborate plan to defame Ms. Heard was willful and malicious.

3.                  Contrary to his allegations and efforts to rewrite history, Depp did in fact engage in acts of domestic violence and abuse against Ms. Heard, and Ms. Heard did not perjure herself, fabricate evidence, defraud, or create a hoax. Depp’s statements and allegations, both  through Depp and his agent Waldman (acting on Depp’s behalf), are false and defamatory.

4.                  In this Counterclaim, Ms. Heard seeks a judicial declaration that her op-ed is not actionable, is protected by Virginia’s Anti-SLAPP statute, Virginia Code § 8.01-233.2, and Ms. Heard is entitled to reasonable attorney fees and costs pursuant to Virginia Code § 8.01-233.2.

5.                  Ms. Heard further seeks to restore the balance of truth and fight back, as the victim of domestic abuse and violence, and take a stand against this continuing and unrelenting  abuse. Ms. Heard seeks compensatory damages and punitive damages from Depp for his false and defamatory statements and for the harassment and abuse of computers and computer accessed media, as set forth in this Counterclaim."

According to reporter Joey Davis:
On Adam Waldman's previous client, Oleg Deripaska:
"If you’ve read the five volumes of the US Senate’s investigation of Russian influence in the 2016 election, you know the name. If not, he just may be the richest man you’ve never heard of. With an estimated worth of $6.2 billion, Oleg Deripaska is a Russian billionaire and Kremlin insider. In a leaked U.S. diplomatic cable from 2017, he was described as one of “2-3 oligarchs Vladmi Putin turns to on a regular basis.” He’s been denied U.S visas for his suspected connections to Russian organized crime...

 In reaction to the charges by Heard and her legal team, Waldman tweeted, “Ms Heard’s Counterclaim are the allegations of fake petitions and non-human bots and trolls and some kind of dastardly Cyrillic Russian involvement!! And the spiders from Mars…"

The Hollywood Reporter Senior Editor Eriq Gardner September 2:  "Amazing that this lawyer in the midst of a defamation fight tweets out something false about me even after being told it’s false. What’s more, stunning that he can’t help himself even as he’s apparently about to fight having to give a deposition about social media activity. "

"... against Adam R. Waldman, Esquire.
You state that Mr. Waldman is “. . . inciting online social media against people . . .” and “. . . harming the legal trials . . .” on Twitter involving his client, Johnny Depp’s case before Fairfax County Circuit Court. You state that Mr. Waldman’s tweets amount to witness intimidation and coercion, and that this behavior is also damaging to the public and reporters. You also state that the judge presiding over the case appears to discourage this behavior.
We decline to open a formal investigation of this matter, as this is a pending case and the parties may address this issue with the court. If the Court finds that Mr. Waldman has engaged in impropriety, such as violating a gag order, or if the Court holds Mr. Waldman in contempt of court, you may write to us again..."

Notice how Amber Heard can describe very dangerous, visually horrible acts of violence against her, including strangling, burning threats, intimidation, and bruised ribs, and Depp has revealed in the audio leaks that he says Amber "cannot deck him."

Online perceptions were attempted to be altered by referring to Amber truthfully stating she was 115 lbs and that any fight would not be fair. Evidence that would be supporting Amber Heard is twisted by these accounts online. 

According to Joey Davis and The Geek Buzz, who as been following this case for one and a half years: "In January 2018, Twitter disclosed its security personnel assess that over 50,000 automated accounts linked to Russia were tweeting election-related content during the U.S. presidential campaign...

The types of AI used to power these bots, and the mentality of paid and hobbyist trolls who purposely spread disinformation, isn’t always reserved for elections, but it’s always political. Case, or cases, in point: Trolls and bots that auto-post negative reviews en masse of games, movies, and TV shows that usually feature women and people of color in empowered roles. When Larry Johnson of Entrepreneur Magazine wrote about this in December of 2019, he was already late to the game because Captain Marvel (here and here), Starwars, Batwoman, and others had already fallen victim to the practice..."

Notice how tabloids and media will insert a single claim against Amber, which the enabling culture and institutions that Amber described, will use to claim her detailed descriptions and data are not valid... Yet, the violence and abuse against Amber Heard is clearly documented and heinous.

One example even describes raw meat left around the house, when that supposed previous partner of ex-staffer from last year wrote that Depp is fascinated with serial killers...

"...Today, NGN’s lawyer Sasha Wass QC asked Heard, 34, about the incident in Australia in March 2015, when Ms Heard alleges Mr Depp was taking MDMA and drinking heavily....

Ms Wass asked Ms Heard about the evidence of Ben King, Mr Depp’s previous estate manager, on the damage to the house in which they were staying – which included broken windows, graffiti on mirrors and blood and paint on the walls and floors....

She added: ‘He had burned holes through some cushions and through some lampshades, blood and paint, more messages on cushions, there was a couch flipped over. ‘It appeared to be he had set fire to one of the cushions because the carpet was burned around it a little.

‘My paints were out, it appeared to be that maybe he had either thrown or dropped paint on the floor and on the wall. More messages in paint and blood, I could see both textures.

‘I found raw meat, at first I didn’t know what it was, on the floor. Not just on the floor, I continued to find it… that day, hidden in various places.

‘He had taken my nightgown and ripped it into shreds. He wrapped pieces of food (in it).’

Ms Heard said there was a ‘significant pooling of blood on the floor, on the steps leading to the stairs. I could see my own bloody footprints (from the night before) but I could also see what appeared to be dropped blood’. She said: ‘I assumed it was from my own arms and hands and feet.’

Ms Heard continued that, when she got downstairs, Mr Depp was playing ‘death metal, blasting really loud’ and she could see ‘tonnes of broken glass’.

Ms Heard added: ‘There were windows broken, there was so much glass on the floor I could barely find a pathway to walk. There was damage left in the house in March 2015 (Picture: PA/PA Wire) ‘The ping pong table was broken and on the ground.’

... Ms Heard replied: ‘Yes, about 24 hours into his binge, rage, I had previously come downstairs… I knew he just needed to eat or sleep and the moment I described yesterday, where he offered the bottle to me, this is after he had held me up against the fridge by my neck.

‘He was screaming at me for ruining his life, he said over and over again that I ruined his f***ing life and that he wished he had never met me and that I did this… I made him this mad, I made him drink, I did this and I always did this.

‘He held a bottle up against my face, he told me that he would slice up my face.

‘I accept at some point I either pushed him or pushed his arms off me...

‘It was after that moment or after those moments, he was so angry he punched the wall… he started hitting the wall, he was punching the wall and he got carried away in that moment.

‘He saw the phone… it was kind of a mint green, cream Bakelite, plastic mounted phone on the wall and he picks it up and the hand that had been on my neck loosened a little bit as he was focused on the phone and I stepped back… while he proceeded to, instead of punching with his hand, his fist, he used the phone.’

Ms Heard told the court that Mr Depp smashed the phone ‘repeatedly, over and over again, into the wall, screaming at the top of his lungs and I watched as this phone just was disappearing in front of my own eyes’. She said that when Mr Depp was smashing the phone against the wall ‘it was breaking off in shards’.

Then look again in the article and notice how pieces are inserted. This is a lesson in critical thinking: https://metro.co.uk/2020/07/23/johnny-depp-threatened-slice-amber-heards-face-australia-row-13028690/

There can be entire detailed, documented descriptions, and the online social media institutions will continue to allow the cyberabuse against businesses supporting her, and against Amber Heard directly.

As referenced, Hate Lab and Ditch the Label are unable to remove individual social media accounts, which may be created with hateful altering of her photos. 3rd parties, even BullyBlocker, were blocked from accessing Facebook in 2018. 

According to the Association of Progressive Communications in 2015, social media platforms do not stop or understand violence against women: "... no social media/networking company surveyed had made a public commitment to human rights, nor demonstrated a clear understanding of violence against women.``

FACTS:

  • Did you know that domestic violence is the most commonly experienced incident by 911 dispatchers in the United States?
  • Did you know that 911 cannot geolocate (find your location through technology) or use real-time data? There is no application for 911 that's effective. You cannot text or get language translations from 911. It's not like TV - they don't know who you are or where you are.
  • Over 60% of calls to 911 may be about domestic violence. Did you know that there are 900,000 to 3 million reports of domestic violence a year?
  • Among defendants prosecuted in Chicago's domestic violence misdemeanor court, 60.7 percent were found to have “ever had an alcohol or drug problem.” [107]
  • Most victims who petition courts for protection orders have suffered several years of abuse with the same abuser before coming to court for the first time. In a multistate (and District of Columbia) study, researchers found that only 10 percent sought protection orders after a week of abuse, 15 percent experienced abuse for one to two years, and nearly 25 percent had endured abuse for more than five years. [133]
  • According to the victims, almost a quarter (23 percent) of the abusers “very often” or “almost always” got drunk when they drank, more than half (55 percent) were binge drinkers, 29.3 percent used cocaine at least once a month, and more than a third (39 percent) smoked
    marijuana. Furthermore, almost two-thirds of abusers were drinking at the scene of the incident,
    having consumed an average of almost seven drinks, resulting in more than half of them (58 percent) being drunk. [126]
  • According to the NCVS, most offenses (60 percent) occur between 6 p.m. and 6 a.m. at the victim's home. [27]
  • In Massachusetts, 37.3 percent of the female victims fought back in the incident in which their
    male abuser was arrested. However, most (59.1 percent) of those females who fought back found that this made their abuser more violent. [23] A substantial number of victims will not self-disclose their victimization. [93]

Solutions and Updates: 

We submitted online reports and emails to organizations about the hate crimes against Amber Heard, (in the UK, hate crimes can be before it is violent, such as verbal, written, online, and abusive) including how it escalated outside the UK trial, to Stop Hate UK, which said they'll periodically monitor it online, but without permission from the victim (we do not talk to Amber Heard), couldn't report it further.

We're actually involved with advocating and trying to start public safety technology that is victim-centered to save lives for almost 2 years now. Amber Heard's case demonstrates enabling culture, witness issues, and how data needs to be collected. People should be evaluating how even with data, United Nations support, and positive leadership, how culture is pushed against Amber Heard. 

According to Equality Can't Wait, it will take 208 years before women are equal in the United States. The online institutions are not helping, and actually are pushing it backwards with hateful enabling and discrimination.

Could you imagine going through such violence and abuse, then all of these institutions, false accounts, tabloid media, and more try to ruin your leadership, self-sufficiency, or any progress?

Even with domestic abuse being the most commonly experienced incident, when a public figure such as Amber Heard comes forward to lead against it with influence, it's then a battle to try to keep awareness, as power works to try to silence and stop their advocacy.

Many Women's places have closed during COVID-19, when domestic abuse and cyberabuse is increasing, and there is no crowdsourced help or housing in the United States. 

Why is it taking such a long time to stop the abuse against Amber Heard? Look into these questions and work on solutions.

We support and care about Amber!

Read this article from The Geek Buzz surrounding the background of Amber Heard's counterclaim, that includes Adam Waldman, Deripaska, and attacks against female leadership, "Amber Heard, Johnny Depp and The Cyrillic Russian Spiders From Mars": https://www.thegeekbuzz.com/the-basement/cyrillic-russian-spiders-from-mars/

title: UK Case Going Well: Amber Heard Was Threatened with Knife & Violence - Abuse, Hate, Equality, & Tech
description:
The United Kingdom Case with NGN (The Sun News) is going well for Amber Heard - yet she cannot be heard above hate groups and online discrimination.

The proceedings of the Sun case (Depp vs NGN) under Judge Andrew Nicol shows extensive details of violence and abuse from data collecting.

We recommend watching this video to get a clearer understanding of how so much abuse can happen in a culture that ignores it.

Amber Heard was threatened with a knife by Johnny Depp, was hit multiple times in Domestic Violence, and physically injured.

This video (Amber Heard is Innocent 2) shows the background that witnesses of the domestic abuse refused to speak publicly because of the Hollywood and cultural setting which doesn't reward helping victims - even if it's the right thing to do.

In this video, Amber Heard is threatened by Johnny Depp with a knife after she refuses to cut him when he asks her to, and he mocks her about scars and going to court. A video shows JD saying he headbutted Amber, but "that wouldn't break a nose."

A photo of missing Anthony Fox was sent by an alleged romantic partner of ex-staff saying staff are threatened with it since he wanted to testify against Depp (linked to earlier with screenshots from last year). Similarly, Evan Rachel Wood, who was abused by JD's best friend, Marilyn Manson, is shown reading a testimony that Manson threatened people if they wanted to expose him and threatened Evan with killing himself, yet at the same time violently abusing her and causing fear for numerous people.

She passed Phoenix Act: http://PhoenixAct.com

This video links Hollywood/Los Angeles culture (claiming women want fame and they shouldn't stand up for victims), Hate Online for being a woman and sexuality/LGBT identities, and covering up abuse with bystanders.

Hollaback is shown encouraging interfering to stop abuse and Duty to Rescue Law to create liability for not helping others.

Humanitarian Work:

Amber Heard is a United Nations Human Rights Champion, ACLU Women's Rights Ambassador, and leader.

SUPPORT HER in Aquaman 2!

Stop violence against women with technology!

 

The below shows evidence of violence and abuse against Amber Heard, as well as bystanders:

From a Diary entry from Amber Heard:

"Johnny… at one point found himself with his shirt wrapped around my neck... I don’t even know how I wound up with this huge, rather annoying knot on the back of my head. F--k, I hate that..."

JD stated in leaked Audio 2 from a 2015 marriage tape that they "had a physical fight on the train" during their honeymoon as well as in San Francisco.

Video: https://youtu.be/ibiPJvTTMXA?t=77

 

Journalist Nick Wallis is regularly live-posting quotes from the UK Court case of Depp vs NGN:

A bodyguard told Amber that if he didn't interfere, then either Amber would be dead or JD would be dead, showing that deadly physical violence existed against AH: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281220109974016005

Other Quotes from Court:

  • Security did not enter during JD's damage worth 5 figures to Australian house: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281217616531591168 https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281217047922446336

  • JD has bloody knuckles from destroying furniture: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281161362660614144
  • JD kicked and damaged his trailer: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281163413993947136 https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281162449849405440
  • Crushing injury, not related to velocity: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281227233080868866

  • AH called heroic for taking care of JD: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1281156000251346944

Robbie Kaplan:

"... imagine what happens every single day to the millions of other women out there who have been abused or assaulted and are not famous actresses and don’t have the resources to hire lawyers to defend them." https://twitter.com/kaplanrobbie/status/1281938991953195009

 

We say that people should use technology to stop violence against women - Amber Heard data collected evidence.

Upon the above about financial, legal, or publicity resources referenced, is that Amber Heard data collected her injuries, the abuse, and situations with texts, videos, and audios.

If she did not collect this Data, likely, Amber Heard could have never become a Leader on Gender Equality or speak out against her abuse with evidence in spite of any intimidation of witnesses or unhelpful bystanders.

She did the right thing by coming forward and knowing that her abusive situations were wrong in order to keep evidence.

You can have money for lawyers or be a public figure, but without evidence as referred to in the proposal that passed Phoenix Act to extend the statute of limitations, including from this progressive example on data collecting, there may no witnesses or intimidated witnesses, and that can stop help for the victim. 

Issues with Discrimination by "Wild West" Technology and Social Media Leadership:

  • MotivatorNet, our Twitter account, was suspended during the UK trial and while trying to support Amber, women, UN, using hashtags, and recently, LGBT/ILoveGay.
  • According to Hate Lab in the UK, misogyny is the most common form of hate on Twitter, and they're unable to remove accounts or see individual posts and in 2018 they were completely cut off as a 3rd party from Facebook, which has the highest abuse against Amber aside from Twitter. 
  • We also asked UK Anti-Bullying organization Ditch the Label if they could do anything about the cyberabuse and bullying on Amber's accounts as well as for the businesses (Aquaman Movie and L'Oreal) supporting her, but they're unable to for someone over 25 and they may still see it as tabloid-related, as well as seeing it on as different level for public figures.
  • We view the cyberabuse as teaching people to not help others, interfering to harm crime victims, and inhumane online mobs.
  • Our video shows that Amber Heard Italia (a fan group) was hacked to have their Facebook page deleted after 11 years of work.
  • Before then, PinkieJeanSpears found that their account had been logged into from Colorado, USA, which forced them to change their name from supporting Britney Spears and Amanda Bynes (Free Britney and Amanda). The account was tagged by us...

Amber Heard supports Cyber Civil Rights, but will the future ever change online?

 

Update July 21, 2020:

Lawyer Adam Waldman and others around this case have incited people (and simulations) online to intimidate witnesses and supporters from speaking up, since they are afraid of it impacting their lives, safety, and business relationships. Adam Waldman also told the NGN in an email that Amber Heard looked like 'gone girl' in February.

She had over 40,000 hateful comments on one IG post. We went onto our instagram that month with the purpose to help her.

July 20, 2020: "MW is now making a complaint about Adam Waldman (who has been tweeting from Court 13) what MW says are threatening tweets about the witness evidence - particularly the “in memoriam” tweet which is says is macabre. We ask he desists from all further tweeting." From Journalist Nick Wallis: https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1285136683181187073

"Judge - the phrase in memoriam is… unwelcome."
"Judge - anybody attending this trial must take care that what they put out on twitter is not misconstrued or construed as a threat."
"DS absolutely
Judge - the witnesses giving evidence in this trial must feel able to do so safely
DS Absolutely, but I don’t believe there was any intent in the way the defendants suggest there is.
Judge - fine. We’ll leave it there."
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1285137927039864833
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1285138230430531585
https://twitter.com/nickwallis/status/1285138602180083713

Journalists have repeatedly responded to the faceless adam_waldman twitter account as if it's a real account. It's posting inciting claims.

The social media companies are not protecting witnesses, victims, or legal cases. They also do not data collect for it, which is another reason we took screenshots of that alleged partner of ex-staff last year - it would have been lost.

Moreover, a hateful billboard was seen outside the trial, with groups calling for it to be questioned as 'hate crime' (against women). It is from a UK website for men divorcing women. The group claimed it was the best advertisement in the world for divorce against women. 

We've been repeatedly asked if we have been paid to help Amber Heard. The answer is and will always be no. It actually pays less to help Amber Heard, because hate and bullying is profitable.

We help because we're not bystanders and feel obligated to help her life. This is nonprofit.

Update July 26:

Online crowdfunding harms helping Amber Heard's side to be seen. In fact, we cannot link to reporter Nick Wallis's website because they re-ordered the witness statements in that you cannot see clearly whose witnesses are whose, and shows JD's photo instead of AH's (or NGN's). Confusion with irrelevance has been used to prevent her from being supported.

We want you to be able to see her side which is very strongly supported with witnesses who saw Amber's injuries and distress - such as by Josh Drew, Melanie Inglessis, Whitney Henriquez, Kristina Sexton, IO Tillet-Wright, and Raquel Pennington. The link to Melanie Inglessis's statement was also removed in their website update, as was the Laura Divenere recording stating she was coerced by Adam Waldman and supported Amber, the transcripts of the recording, and her declaration. We care about you, Amber!

 

We are glad that Amber Heard is likely winning this case!

We can only hope that the public views and leaders of technology/social media focus on public safety, data, and equality to catch up with her... and her nonprofit partners, causes, the United Nations SDG5, LGBT equality, Hollaback, international discrimination laws, and others to improve lives with technology and create new social views.

We are happy for The Geek Buzz first posting the article about our petition mentioning Amber's humanitarian and social good work. They encouraged us to create this petition, as Joey has female friends who experienced domestic abuse, and supports both Amber Heard and Melissa Benoist.

Change media and tech about violence against women!

We stand with Amber Heard.

title: What's Amber Heard's Side? (AUDIO 2) - Fearing for life, escalating fights, yet cyberbullied
description:
Amber Heard's Side of Audio Leak 2. #BeNotABystander to domestic abuse. The audio actually does support her.

She feared for her life, there were escalating fights, and she refers to multiple acts of violence. 

Previous interpretations by tabloids and YouTubers (such as the mysterious 'incredibly average' which appeared the same month JD lost his role, yet before AH wrote the Op-Ed, and which only has videos related to the online hate campaign against her...) have only shown JD's side with interruptions, but half of the audio of the 30 minutes strongly supports Amber, with the beginning mostly a legal discussion. We've ordered it with importance and explanations on the screen of her side of the story.

We think you should see this video to understand how it's been manipulated falsely against her, especially online, and exploiting social status.

SIGN TO SUPPORT HER: https://www.change.org/p/amber-heard-supporters-we-support-amber-heard-in-aquaman-2

-- Believe Abuse Against Women Early, Interfere, and Support Their Leaving --

#StopDomesticViolence - We list Her Side below...

HER SIDE:

  • She feared for her life and that JD would 'accidentally' kill her.
  • She believes JD is an abuser. She refers to abuse & violence in December, May, and April.
  • IO Tillett called 911 because of escalating violence and she feared physical harm and needed to protect herself.
  • Bodyguards told her off record that she would be killed, and one is recorded on a phone witnessing violence.
  • Travis (guard) had to pull JD away from Amber. (JD admits this)
  • She has collaborating photos and text messages to her mother, family, and friends as proof.
  • She missed work because of fear of bruising and injuries the next day, and texted Jodi
  • (Amber Heard is crying, intimidated, and stressed - in the audio and life)
  • She is defending herself and says it makes JD angry that she defends herself. He is attacking her with abuse even on the phone call.
  • She has documented evidence, and eyewitness statements over the years of abuse who would provide statements under oath.
  • She has collaborating texts, photos, and statements with time stamps and matching dates of abuse.
  • Texts between people, people overhearing their fights, people seeing it the next day of abuse, or responding to the abuse.
  • She says JD doesn't believe her (crying) and it's pointless, but she's telling the truth with the timeline matching.
  • She was told she had a strong case of domestic violence, and if she filed against JD, they would prosecute him. She said she wanted to protect him and waited for the RO.
  • She says she doesn't want to hurt him.
  • She says JD used TMZ, tabloid media, to smear her credibility. She was *forced* to respond and defend herself.
  • TMZ was creating lies while she was in LA Court about there not being two sets of police officers at the penthouses. They subpoenaed the the security records as proof.
  • She cannot overpower him, and there's a large physical difference between them. He claims she 'started' the fights. She has photos, audio, and texts* of abuse. No fair fights in strength or ability.
  • She, her family, and her friends have received death threats - which is not safety.
  • JD gets angry about Amber Heard saying he is sending info to the tabloid media and raises his voice, saying she didn't 'make nice nice' and will see her in court.
  • JD tells Amber she 'doesn't exist to him.' Amber Heard says he doesn't need to be cruel on top of it.
  • JD says going to court will harm both of them and is telling Amber Heard to use the NDA and written letter to settle.
  • JD is telling her to not go to court.
  • JD tells Amber he knows she wants to defend herself and respond.
  • JD acknowledges fights between Amber and him in the past, it's already known and out there, and mentions the NDA & letter.
  • She says her credibility was dishonestly smeared. JD says the abuse needs to be dealt with (NDA).
  • JD blames Amber for being *forced* to defend, protect herself, and to respond and for the smearing of her in the tabloid media and online.
  • Amber Heard did not want any of this to happen and to be forced to defend herself, but JD won't believe her. She has the timeline (crying).
  • She says she only has her integrity...

Amber Heard has a long-term leadership, humanitarian, positive background with credibility:

She was the first American actress to be named Human Rights Champion to the United Nations Human Rights Office. She's an ambassador for the ACLU, donor to Women's Rights Groups, protector of refugees, and does charity. She has spent years helping children.

- Supporter of Born This Way Foundation, GLAAD, Habitat for Humanity, The Trevor Project, RiseNowUS, Sam's USA, Cyber Civil Rights Initiative, SHIELD Act, Center for Inquiry, World Identity Network, and Human Rights Campaign.

- Spoken at global events like the UN Social Good Summit, Global Citizen Festival, One Young World Conference, L'Oreal Women of Worth, and Emery Awards Gala.

She's Mera in the movie Aquaman.

We created this video & petition because we would prevent & stop abuse against women...

Don't be a bystander or go with crowds - dig & look into the story, stand up for underdogs, & understand the situational stress involved and social status dynamics.

- See Something, DO something...

(See this Anti-Crime Experiment - Would You Save Her?)

It's imperative to realize that their goal is to destroy her, and it's important that even when/if she wins her high-profile case, that people can look back and see her evidence. 

The ACLU further is against harassment of women online, and we can see that it creates distortions to escalate violence, threats, discrimination, and lack of safety. 

Her ex, further, has refused to provide evidence during discovery, including the 70,000 texts and emails sent to The Sun, which is now known by the parties for Amber Heard. Although the texts between Johnny Depp and Paul Bettany were not allowed in the UK because they were sent without permission, even if they show clear violence and threats with graphic details, it's still being exposed.

Edit: On March 18, 2020: In UK Court again, texts between JD and his doctor reveal that he admits twice to harming his own finger during the 3 day blackout where he abused and assaulted Amber Heard in Australia as seen in the Telegraph. However, the exploitation of social status online caused mobs to believe lies from JD accusing her, despite it being not logical for afar vs close up.

It possibly ended up beneficial that JD caused the case to be postponed to August in the end by refusing to provide evidence, since The Sun case is beforehand and provides credibility, as well as exposing the other violence and abuse in texts as if precedence.

Court documents in Virginia from March 16, 2020 show that witnesses such as Laura Divenere have been coerced, given leading questions, given false information, and intimidated by JD's lawyer Adam Waldman. A recorded conversation's transcript shows the inappropriate actions by Waldman.

It's clear that there are continuing moves to cover up the domestic abuse of Amber Heard and ruin her humanitarian work, resources, and any positive support. 

March 20, 2020: Uploaded Amber Heard's Side of AUDIO 1 - 

Yelling led to 3 physical fights as retaliation against her in 1-2 months (blaming her for 'starting' fights), she was kicked repeatedly, escalations led to possibility of crime scene and being killed, and more...

"I’ve spent decades fighting the tech industry to change policies that are inherently designed to sustain and profit from systemic abuse online, all in an effort to help keep LGBTQ people like myself safer. I’m proud to have some victories under my belt, but unfortunately we have a long way to go, and the work is far from over. title: NotABystander: WB Protects Amber Heard's Role, UK Court Shows Ex Threatening to Kill Her, & Updates
description:
WB for Aquaman may protect Amber Heard's role as Mera, and the UK Court showed texts from her ex threatening to kill her graphically. Virginia Legislature has also passed an anti-SLAPP law citing her lawsuit as an example.

WB/L'Oreal know that the cyberabuse and cyberbullying from social media is biased exploitation fueled by tabloids - which are not the Washington Post or New York Times supporting Amber Heard.

According to ScreenGeek, Feb 24: "A source close to the situation has told us:

'Warner Bros. doesn’t care about the allegations made about Amber Heard nor do they have interest in social media. As such, there’s nothing going on with her role on Aquaman 2 and they wouldn’t consider firing her. The petitions to get her dropped from L’Oreal are also highly unlikely to go anywhere with the company. L’Oreal runs Amber Heard’s social media pages and are very fond of her.'

The source continues to explain there’s a lot more going on with the case as well, including evidence that could be damaging against Johnny Depp.

'In fact, there’s much more to these allegations than what’s been revealed so far. This is why Amber Heard hasn’t settled with Johnny Depp. While the audio recordings with Amber Heard don’t look good, Amber still has incredibly damaging evidence against Johnny Depp. With that said, Amber Heard and her legal team have chosen to do everything involving their case in court rather than rely on social media.'"

Amber Heard spoke at the Women's March in Los Angeles in January, referring to 3 years where she suffered. Like other women, she has not received aid, support, or respect and has been treated as a discretely silenced second-class citizen.

"That's why many of us choose to not speak up," stated Amber Heard.

From the Washington Post, Feb 11: 

"The Virginia legislature passed bills Tuesday that would make it harder to pursue frivolous lawsuits designed to chill free speech, a response to a string of splashy defamation cases filed in state courts by Rep. Devin Nunes (R-Calif.), actor Johnny Depp and others...

Their targets include CNN, the New York Times, Twitter, the actress Amber Heard, the Fresno Bee and a parody Twitter account in the voice of an imaginary cow.

...meaning someone with deep pockets can harass a defendant with expensive and protracted litigation. Such cases are known as strategic lawsuits against public participation, or SLAPP.

Virginia’s new anti-SLAPP bills would afford defendants stronger protections."

Amber Heard fan groups on Instagram finally saw our petition, and there are also a few other petitions in support of her now appearing. We thank them for sharing, linking in their IG bios, and finally realizing the need to be an activist and leader such as Amber Heard would be!

It's preventive, rather than reactionary, as we see with other "Free [name here]" movements, such as Kesha or Britney Spears, it's often done too late or afterwards. It affects everyone in the industry and it can affect people around public figures, such as ex-staff or those knowing them. They're not bulletproof. 

We're thankful that 70,000 texts and emails (see page 9 of UK Court filing of texts from 2013 and 2014 referring to different instances of threats and violence) were sent to The Sun for the United Kingdom Court case by the ex-legal team and lawyers of her ex. Originally, it was 400 to be disclosed. However, it was sent civilly, and not to the law. Someone possibly did the ethical and right choice. It's shown earlier that ex-staff or others may be too afraid to testify. Similarly, a paralegal spoke up about Spears. We can see similar movements, if it's noticed.

In dangerous situations such as Amber Heard is in involving physical abuse, threats to life, coercive control, collusion, and high amounts of money, it's especially important for people to protect and stand up for the victim. 

Are We All Celebrities Now? Amber Heard spoke up for others and equal rights in her New York Times Op-Ed.

"Denying the right of anyone, famous or not, to exercise control over who is allowed to see their naked bodies or to witness their intimate activities is to deny their humanity...

Today everyone is one step away from becoming famous. The power of social media makes it possible for any person to be dragged before the eyes of the world...

Every person, from the most famous to the most obscure, from the privileged to the poor, deserves privacy."

How you treat public figures expands outwards and sets an example. There should be equal status.

We link to it, and we want Amber Heard's humanitarian work and leadership to continue. To do that, she needs to keep her career and resources.

We are glad that Amber protected herself against the cyberbullying on IG which also likely included paid comments to boost negativity with spam to create false online distortions. Ex JD was already a liability to producers with numerous lawsuits, and her Washington Post Op-Ed was written the month after he lost 1 role while he has others and high financial means. We continue to defend her!

We posted Amber Heard's Side of the Audio Leak 2, where she says she feared for her life, and other evidence (#BeNotABystander).

-- Believe Abuse Against Women Early, Interfere, and Support Their Leaving --

The United Nations, which Amber Heard is a Human Rights Champion of, is against online violence and harassment against women. "Abuse online is still abuse, with potency and very real consequences.”

We want her to have a life! We encourage positive social action.

Keep supporting Amber Heard!

title: Appeal denied!
description:
Amber Heard has tried at least three times to have Johnny Depp’s defamation suit against her dismissed. Her dismissal attempts have seemed endless, but those attempts might have come to an end.

Judge Penney Azcarate has handed down a ruling that refused to allow Amber Heard’s lawyers to petition the Virginia Supreme Court to become involved in the case. Basically, Heard wanted the Supreme Court to throw out Depp’s defamation case because he lost the UK libel suit against the Sun tabloid, which labeled him a Wife Beater.

Judge Azcarate had previously ruled against Heard’s dismissal attempt, so Heard tried to go over the judge’s head and have the Supreme Court do it instead. It didn’t work.

If Heard’s appeal had been approved, it would have meant the end of Depp’s defamation suit against her.

Filed in March 2019, Depp’s defamation suit contends that Heard defamed him when she wrote an op-ed describing herself as a domestic abuse survivor. The op-ed didn’t name Depp, but followed months of Heard’s allegations that he had abused her.

Depp lost his role in Disney’s Pirates of the Caribbean franchise four days after the op-ed came out. Depp is asking for $50 million in damages.

Not to be outdone, Heard has filed a counterclaim against Depp asking for $100 million, alleging that Depp orchestrated a smear campaign against her – including allegations that Depp is/was responsible for this petition's creation. I remain ready and able to prove that he had nothing to do with it.

The trial is set for spring/summer 2022. I’m keeping my schedule flexible in case they call me.
