title: Amber Heard could face 3 years in jail for faking evidence
description:
Amber Heard could be charged with submitting falsified evidence in her abuse case against Johnny Depp. She claims that Johnny beat her up, but Johnny says that he can prove those black eyes were fake.

We already suspected as much because with such traumatic injuries comes swelling, and she had none. Not to mention the fact that her bruises moved from one day to the next, whenever it was necessary to paint them on for show.

In 2019 Amber Heard’s personal stylist, Samantha McMillen, went on record stating that she believes that her black eyes were fake, saying that: “On December 16, 2015, I spent much of the day and evening with Amber Heard, preparing her to appear on the James Corden show. I saw her throughout the day of December 16, 2015, in good light, at close range, wearing no makeup. Throughout the day of December 16, 2015, I could see clearly that Amber Heard did not have any visible marks, bruises, cuts, or injuries to her face or any other part of her body. She appeared as a guest on the James Corden show that day.”

There you have it.

In the state of California, a person who is found to have falsified evidence  can be convicted of a felony under California Penal Code sections 132 or 134 for a maximum sentence of 3 years. 

The question is whether or not she'd do any time at all, even if convicted. So far, she's gotten away with a boatload of offences, including beating her husband, without seeing the inside of a jail cell. 

This isn't the first time she has submitted falsified documents or has been faced with jail time. In 2016 Heard plead guilty for supplying falsified documents when she smuggled her two dogs into Australia. And she got out of any real punishment for that. 

What do you think? Should Amber Heard go to jail for falsifying evidence and submitting false reports?

SOURCE

title: Amber Heard reportedly fired from Aquaman 2
description:
Amber Heard is facing removal from the Aquaman Franchise, as well as being banned from WB productions and several other screen projects, according to a multitude of articles over the last few days. 

Koimoi.com explains that not only will Mera go the way of the dodo, but that Jason Momoa's Arthur Curry could be replaced as Aquaman. He'll still serve as king, but the role of Aquaman could be handed over to Aqualad. 

Bounding Into Comics says that Warner Bros. might be feeling the heat from Aquaman star Amber Heard’s bad press. Reports are saying Heard might be removed from Aquaman 2 or see her role reduced greatly. We would obviously prefer the former. Though this humble petitioner would pay double to see Mera get killed off in some gruesome fashion in the first ten minutes.

Small Screen reports that Amber Heard has been fired as Mera from Aquaman 2 after the new evidence which has come out of her legal battle with Johnny Depp. There have been rumors for months now that Warner Bros. Pictures and DC Comics might be forced to fire Amber Heard.

Sausage Roll says that Reports are flowing in from Hollywood alleging that Amber Heard has been removed from the upcoming Aquaman sequel and subsequently expelled from any future Warner Brothers production indefinitely.

The International News says that Certain media outlets have claimed that the makers of the Aquaman are contemplating over removing Amber from the cast of the film. However, an official statement is still awaited in this regard. We hope it's just a matter of time. 

There are a lot more articles out there, and they all say the same thing. It's no guarantee, of course. And it would be wise to wait for official confirmation before celebrating. But we remain hopeful.

When we first started this petition, it was heartfelt, but didn't really stand much of a chance of making any difference. Since then, though, we've garnered over 400,000 signatures, and reports indicate that Heard being removed from Aquaman is a real possibility.

Here's hoping.

title: Amber Heard's PI digs up dirt on her, not Johnny
description:
Former porn star turned Hollywood "fixer" Paul Barresi was hired by Amber Heard's legal team last summer to find people who had been verbally or physically abused by Johnny Depp. 

Barresi said he was hired to look into Depp's 'follies and vices' in the hopes those who spoke out against Depp would testify in the upcoming defamation cases. He spoke to 100 people across the US and Europe who worked with Depp on films dating back 30 years. 

Problem is, he couldn't find a single person who had a bad word to say about Depp. "In fact, they couldn't say enough about his ever flowing outpouring of generosity and tender heart" Barresi said.

Rather, some had unkind things to say about Heard instead. 

See, that's the problem. When a shrew goes after a genuinely nice guy. The dirt that gets dug up is going to land on her, not him.

title: Amber Heard loses bid to have $50m Defamation suit dismissed
description:
Amber Heard tried to have Johnny Depp's $50m defamation suit dismissed, citing that her op-ed in the Washington Post never named Depp.

But Chief Judge Bruce D. White rejected her motion to dismiss on the grounds that three of the four sentences the Pirates of the Caribbean star complained about could 'convey the alleged defamatory meaning that Mr Depp abused Ms Heard.'

The article did not mention Depp by name, but he filed for defamation in March of last year, saying that the op-ed implied that he was the abuser and caused him to lose the role of Captain Jack Sparrow. $50m would have been his paycheck, hence the amount of damages sought. 

Heard had requested a dismissal on the basis of the statute of limitations because the events referenced occurred back in 2016. But the judge rejected her claim because the defamation suit was filed within four months of the op-ed's publication, well within the statute. 

The Defamation case is due to be heard in August. 

SOURCE

title: Amber Heard cuddles with Elon Musk in penthouse elevator in security video
description:
Amber Heard is seen cuddling up to Elon Musk in the private elevator to Johnny Depp's penthouse in exclusive new images that will drag the Tesla mogul deeper into the couple's explosive legal battle.

Musk has insisted that Heard and Depp were already split by the time he started seeing Heard, and that the relationship didn't become intimate until some time later. These images seem to negate that statement. The Space X inventor, 48, can been seen in one image draping his arms around Heard, who appears to be wearing just a swimsuit and a towel.

Depp's legal team has issued subpoena to Musk for any texts, emails, letters or communications he exchanged with Heard during their marriage or anything mentioning alleged incidents of domestic violence.

They specifically want to know what she told the tech tycoon about the May 21, 2016 fight that resulted in Heard seeking a restraining order, accusing Depp of hurling a phone at her and beating her.

So Musk is drawn even deeper into Depp's 50 million defamation suit. Gotta wonder if she was worth all the trouble.

SOURCE

title: Amber Heard and cancer-ridden girlfriend go shopping at Home Depot despite Covid 19 warnings
description:
Amber Heard and love interest Bianca Butti stepped out together on Monday afternoon (March 23) ins Los Angeles. They went to the Home Depot to stock up on plants and firewood. Neither wore masks or gloves.

For Heard, it's probably no big deal. She's young and healthy. But Bianca Butti is batting breast cancer, and is therefore immuno-compromised. It's seriously not a good idea for her to be out and about while the world is in the grips of a pandemic that could easily kill her, much less with no protection on board. 

Heard, supposedly being a loving partner, should have insisted that her lady love stay home. Surely Heard is capable of buying firewood on her own. Or, at the very least, should have demanded that Butti wear a mask and gloves. 

Your thoughts?

SOURCE

title: Javier Bardem defends Johnny Depp
description:
Pirates Of The Caribbean” co-star, Javier Bardem has stepped forward to defend Johnny Depp against "the lies and manipulations of toxic beings." Namely Amber Heard. 

Bardem went on the record in Depp’s defamation case against his ex-wife and stated he does not believe Depp to be a violent person, adding that Depp has a “respectful attitude” towards those around him.

Bardem goes on to say: ”I love Johnny. He has always been a true gentleman and an extremely generous and caring friend to my family and myself,” Bardem began his statement.

"On top of that, I’ve had the gift of working with him twice and have experienced his respectful attitude towards every single member of the crew alongside his unique and hilarious sense of humor. I stand by Johnny because I have always seen and felt a true caring and loving man in him ... an extraordinary and unique artist who has listened to anyone who needed his help." Bardem says.

Bardem says that he's willing to testify in Depp's defense in upcoming litigation.
SOURCE

title: Depp's Sun libel case postponed
description:
Johnny Depp’s libel case against the Sun has been adjourned to a later date. A two-week trial was due to begin in London on Monday, at which Depp, Heard and a number of Hollywood figures were expected to give evidence.

Two of Depp’s legal representatives have already had to self-isolate. And, according to Mr Justice Nicol, “No one can predict whether others involved in the case, and I do not exclude myself, will either become infected or need to self-isolate."

Travel restrictions between the UK and France, where Depp is currently, and the US, where Heard lives, were a further factor in the decision.

Now, yet again, it's a waiting game.

SOURCE

title: Depp grabbed Heard by the collarbone?
description:
In proceedings in Johnny Depp's libel case against the Sun, Adam Wolanski, QC, (representing The Sun) told the court of the fight between Depp and Heard on March 4, 2015, presumably from Amber Heard's perspective;

“That night the complainant shoved Ms Heard into a ping-pong table, threw bottles through window panels of a glass door, then grabbed Ms Heard and tore off her nightgown. The complainant grabbed Ms Heard by her neck and choked her against the refrigerator. The complainant mocked her, while touching and grabbing her by her breasts and repeatedly shoved her up against the refrigerator. The complainant (Depp) then grabbed Ms Heard by the neck and collarbone, slammed her against the counter-top and strangled her.”

I'm going to keep it short and sweet, here. I just want someone to explain to me how a guy can grab a girl by the collarbone. Feel free to attach diagrams if necessary, because I just can't figure that one out. 

And, while we're at it, I'd like for someone to explain to me how Depp displayed injuries in the days and weeks following the "fight" while Amber heard displayed none. Seems to me that someone thrown through at table and glass door would at least have a scratch. A bruise. Anything.

Meanwhile, the judge will let us know if the trial is going to proceed Monday as scheduled, or if there will be a delay because of the Covid 19 pandemic. 
SOURCE

title: People Magazine reporting on Johnny Depp
description:
For the longest time, the mainstream media refused to report on Johnny Depp and his legal endeavors, even after those tapes that proved that Amber Heard was the aggressor in their relationship surfaced.

Finally, though, parts of the mainstream media are reporting that celebrities are coming forward yet again to maintain that Johnny is a good guy who's never hurt anybody. That he's a kind and generous soul. Like THIS article about Penelope Cruz and Winona Ryder stepping forward to support Depp.

Not that they have much choice. With Amber Heard going on record insisting the Depp abused his former partners, she's all but DEMANDING that these former paramours and/or friends go on record saying that he never did any such thing. 

I know I already reported that Cruz and Ryder are supporting Depp. The focus of this update is that the mainstream media are FINALLY starting to report on it. I think we're on the upswing.

title: New wave of support for Johnny Depp
description:
If you recall, just about ALL of Johnny Depp's exes stepped forward to say that he's a kind and wonderful person when Heard first alleged domestic abuse.

Now, by insisting that Depp abused his exes, Amber Heard is prompting some of them, and his friends, to step forward again to say that he wasn't. 
Wynona Ryder has jumped forward again to defend Johnny, insisting that her once-fiancee was never violent toward her, and that Amber Heard's allegations are impossible to believe.
Penelope Cruz has also stepped forward again as well, saying that she first met Johnny Depp since she was 19 years old, and that "He is always kind to everyone around. He is one of the most generous people I know.”

I have a feeling that with the Sun trial due to start in about a week, we're going to be hearing a LOT more support for Johnny Depp.

title: Amber Head NOT confirmed for Aquaman 2
description:
The internet is losing it's mind because WB DC officially announced a release date for AM2. They're outraged that WB and DC are completely ignoring the fact that Amber Heard has been PROVEN to be a serial abuser, and ignoring the petitions signed by hundreds of thousands of paying fans to remove Amber Heard from AM2. How dare they confirm her for a return to the role of Mera. 

But did they? 

Everything I've read, including those statements confirming the official dates for the movie's release. And ALL  of them use language like "The cast is EXPECTED to return." or "Amber heard is SET to return."

Expected. Set. Prepared. Ready.

Nowhere does it say that Amber Heard is CONFIRMED to return. 

I'm sure she wants to. She's certainly going to need the money to pay of Johnny Depp when he wins his 50 million dollar defamation suit against her. And she seems the type to NEED the fame that comes with stardom.

But let's not get ahead of ourselves. There are two law suits standing between Amber Heard and that role. Johnny's libel suit against the sun and his defamation case against Heard herself. If she's found in the wrong in either one of them, then she's got a lot to lose. 

There's a morals clause in every contract in Hollywood these days. And if Heard loses in either one of those cases, the studio can, and probably will, fire her due to that morals clause. 

Let's not forget that the filming and release date for AM2 was pushed back when these suits were filed, probably for exactly that reason.

WB DC aren't ignoring us. They're covering their collective asses. If they fire her just because of a petition, they open themselves up for a HUGE wrongful termination suit from Heard. 

By waiting for the outcome of these cases, WB DC are giving themselves a valid reason to fire her. If she's fired for a morals clause violation, she can't sue them for wrongful termination. 

Stay calm, folks. It's not over until it's over. Filming hasn't even started. Let's wait and see what happens with these law suits before we throw our outrage around. We know she's going to lose. THEN we can turn our watchful eye to the studio to see what they're going to do about it.

title: Johnny Depp's kids saw
description:
Tara Roberts, Johnny Depp's island estate manager, confirms that Amber Heard abused Johnny Depp when his children were with him on his private island, Little Hall's Pond Cay.  

Heard body-shamed her then-husband. She was reportedly yelling at him that he was “washed ups” and “fat.” They were standing in the parking lot of their house on the island when she physically and verbally attacked Depp.

“I saw Amber lunge at Johnny, clawing, tugging and aggressively pulling him. He continued to stand there yelling at her to stop and leave him alone. When he stepped back to leave, her onslaught would start again. During this entire incident, I never saw Johnny hit Amber, or push her back, nor did he physically react to the attacks,” Roberts said.

That night is when Amber Heard threw a can of paint thinner at Johnny's face, leaving a bloody gash across his nose. The next morning, Roberts witnessed that the kids saw the bloody gash on their father's face.

It's unclear whether or not the kids ever saw Heard abusing their father as it happened, but there is no doubt whatsoever that they saw the aftermath as it took its toll on Johnny Depp.

SOURCE

title: Heard: "I love you and I'm sorry."
description:
Just weeks after the fight that ended the relationship between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's marriage, Heard tried to get a massage to Johnny through Johnny's CAA talent agent, Christian Carino. She wanted Carino to tell Johnny that she loved him, and that she was sorry. This And never mind that there's a restraining order in place.

Carino advised Heard to “leave it alone for a while,” but she was persistent and really wanted to know what Depp was thinking at the time.

Months later, after her breakup with billionaire Elon Musk, Heard chatted Carino up again, to lament that yet another man had left her to deal with a public breakup all on her own.

Instead of consoling his client/friend, Carino reminded Heard that "You weren't in love with him and you told me a thousand times you were just filling space.” 

Ouch. Elon's going to read that, if he hasn't already. Knowing that he was just space filler for Heard, and that he's now being called to testify in Depp's defamation case against her, I'll be Elon's REALLY glad he got involved with that piece of tail. Hardly seems worth it. 

Heard asked if Carino could pass a note from her to Depp.

Yep. Even with that TRO still in effect, she's trying to contact Johnny, violating the TRO herself, and enticing him to violate it, too. 

Depp was having none of it, preferring instead to let the case play out in court. Wisely so.

The short count is on for the libel case against the Sun. By the end of this month, that case will be full steam ahead. 

SOURCE

title: Amber Heard Set Johnny Depp up for violation
description:
Not long after Amber Heard painted on some bruises and filed for a TRO against Johnny Depp, she and Johnny mutually agreed to sit down at a mutually agreed-to meeting in 2016.

After the meeting didn't go her way, Amber Heard allegedly turned johnny Depp in for violating the restraining order.

Remember, this is a meeting that she had mutually arranged, but she tried to put him in jail for it, just because she didn't get what she wanted (translated: she didn't get everything she was asking for- his money, house, belongings and cars- did I forget anything?). 

Johnny, of course, was furious, texting to a friend: "...send me to county for breaking the restraining order...some of which, as you can guess, that she was more than complicit with!!! I couldn't give a f***in' fat rat's ass!! as she wants her name cleared, which can no longer happen in terms of the public's opinion and more than likely the people who run her profession."

Depp further accused Heard of deliberately making him violate the TRO by meeting him in San Francisco just so that she could redeem her public reputation. The worse she could make him look, she apparently thought that it was the better she could make herself look. 

Didn't work. Not then, and not now. 

With Johnny Depp's libel trial against the Sun due to start in just over a week, Heard's reputation will tank even farther than it did after those taped confessions of her beating Johnny Dee surfaced. 

The whole truth will be out then, and there won't be any coming back for her. The only job she'll likely be able to get will be in either the fast food or adult entertainment industries.

Karma, baby.

title: Bianca/Depp double take
description:
Amber Heard held hands with 38-year-old paramour Bianca Butti as they made their way through LAX Airport on Saturday afternoon (March 7) in Los Angeles.

At first glance, it would be an honest mistake to think that it was an old photo of Heard traveling with her ex, Johnny Depp. With her brimmed hat and blue shades, Butti looked every bit the quirky Pirates of the Caribbean star. 
PHOTO
PHOTO
PHOTO

Many in the Twitterverse (including me) are left wondering if this was just a coincidental styling choice made by Butti all by herself, or if Heard had a hand in dressing her lady love up like her ex husband. 

The question would be: WHY? Is Heard trying to send the message that she can still lead Johnny around on a leash? Or is she doing it simply to mock him. With the libel trial against the sun coming up, it's entirely possible that Heard is simply trying to grab headlines the only was she can. The only was she ever could, really. By associating herself with Depp, a REAL star.

What are your thoughts? Coincidence or scheme?

title: Tapes in, texts out
description:
After a hearing in London last week, the judge ordered that the audiotapes where Amber Heard confesses to serially abusing Johnny Depp will be allowed in Depp's libel action against the Sun newspaper. David Sherborne, representing Depp, said the evidence “demonstrates in her own voice that she was not a victim of domestic abuse, but rather that she was the aggressor”.

He added that, in the recordings, Heard is apparently heard to say that no one would believe Depp if he claimed to be a victim of domestic violence.

However, the texts between Johnny Depp and (friend and actor) Paul Bettany are out. 

Also, it is revealed that actress Amanda de Cadenet, a friend of Heard, will give evidence over a video link. It is unclear at this point as to what testimony she will give, whether it will benefit Heard or Depp. 

As has already been reported, Amber Heard plans to appear to testify. Remember, this is the case against the Sun, not Johnny's defamation case against her. She doesn't have to show up for this, but she plans to appear anyway. We have yet to see what she plans to bring to the table and what she expects to gain.

We'll find out in just a couple of weeks, when the suit against the Sun proceeds.

title: photos suggest that Amber Heard also abused Elon Musk
description:
Photographs from when Amber and Elon were dating show Musk sporting a black eye and other facial damage.

This has many people wondering if Amber Heard also abused Elon during the time they were together.

Elon Musk has already been subpoenaed to testify in Johnny Depp's defamation case against Amber Heard. I have to wonder if he's also going to be questioned as to whether or not he was abuse by Amber Heard.

I can't wait to see where all of this leads

title: Amber Heard's glaring perjury
description:
In her declaration against Johnny Depp, under the date marked, "March 2015, Australia", Heard talks about an incident where Depp "pushed me, slapped me, and shoved me to the ground before I retreated to a locked bedroom."

The next day, she alleged that he began throwing pans and bottles at her. A fight ensued and he allegedly got physical with her, hitting her, shoving her to the ground, choking her and spitting on her face.

"I wanted Johnny to go to sleep, in the hopes that he would sober up. Instead, he began to fight with me about our upcoming marriage."

But here there is a problem: Depp and Heard got married in February 2015, a month BEFORE she claimed the abuse in that instance happened.

According to the U.S. Penal Code, any discrepancy in one's court declaration that does not align with the truth in any way could be grounds for perjury. 

"Whoever under oath (or in any declaration, certificate, verification, or statement under penalty of perjury as permitted under section 1746 of title 28, United States Code) in any proceeding before or ancillary to any court or grand jury of the United States knowingly makes any false material declaration or makes or uses any other information, including any book, paper, document, record, recording, or other material, knowing the same to contain any false material declaration, shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than five years, or both," the code says.

Fined, imprisoned, or both.

Amber Heard has a lot more to worry about than losing $50 million to her ex. She very seriously needs to think about how many different ways she's looking at losing her freedom because of her actions.

title: Amber Heard to testify in London next month
description:
Amber Heard is all set to fly to London next month and testify in Johnny's libel suit against the Sun newspaper. The question I have is WHY? As I understand it, she doesn't have to. Has she been subpoenaed? 

There are only two reasons I can think of that she would show up uninvited and pitch her two cents into the ring. 

First, a toxic narcissist will to anything to try to save face. and they're masters of playing the victim. Amber Heard would likely jump at any chance to vilify Johnny and paint herself as the poor, terrorized victim of his unbearable abuse.

Primarily, I think she's going to talk about those texts that Johnny wrote to Paul Bettany. You know, the ones where Johnny talked about burning and drowning Amber, then fucking her dead corpse to make sure she's dead. Anybody with half a brain knows that abuse victims often fantasize that their abuser would die so that the abuse could stop. Johnny was venting to his friend about his abuser. He would never do such a thing. He said so in the very same text.

But Amber's likely won't play it that way. I'm willing to bet real money that she's going to show up and use that text to portray herself as a victim who was afraid for her very life. "He was planning to KILL me!" She'll probably testify, dabbing at the corner of her eye with a tissue. 

Her testimony will have no bearing on the Sun case, because nothing can change the fact that Amber is the one who abused Johnny. No. What she's doing is setting up her testimony so that it will be a matter of record, so that she can use it in Johnny's defamation suit against her.

She plays the long game, let's not forget. She took "damning" photos and set herself up as the victim for probably the entirety of their relationship, knowing what she was ultimately going to do. I wouldn't doubt that the same thing is going on here.

The other reason the I can think of for her to show up and testify is to try to rattle Johnny, who will most likely be there. It's possible that she wants him to see her and fall to pieces, lose his resolve, or make a mistake and say something stupid.

Think about how crazy stupid in love with her he was. Is that really gone from within him? Or does he still have a soft spot for his "made up" ex wife? Could he see her, go all mushy and drop the defamation case?

I don't think so.

Four years is a long time, and a lot of things can happen. One of those things is that Johnny has recovered himself. He's gotten back who he is, and he's steeled his resolve to defend himself against allegations that just aren't true. Seeing her isn't going to make him lose that. If anything, seeing her will strengthen his resolve.

I'd love to know what you guys think about why Amber Heard plans to show up in London next month to testify in the Sun case. Drop and comment and let me know what you think.

title: Steven Spielberg's daughter jailed for domestic abuse.
description:
Mikaela Spielberg, Steven Spielberg's daughter has been jailed for domestic assault with bodily injury after a physical fight with her fiance.

The two were out drinking, and a heated argument developed. Mikaela began pelting fiance Chuck Pankow with various objects. One struck him in the hand, leaving a visible injury. 

Mikaela's bail has been paid, and she's expected back in court on March 9th. 

This is another example of a woman committing domestic abuse. It's not as uncommon as people might think. I'm just glad that the mainstream media has started reporting about cases like this.

Hopefully, with such a high profile case as Johnny Depp's making the news, more men will come forward, and be believed and treated with as much empathy as female survivors.

title: Amber stans attacking petitioners
description:
Angry and scheming Amber Heard stans have begun attacking comments made by petitioners on updates. They've started jumping on people who make comments on updates, attacking and insulting them in the most horrible ways.

Fear not. I do not allow fans to be maligned on my petition. If a comment is made attacking anybody that comments on an update on this petition, it will be removed with the utmost haste. 

I'm not like Amber, trying to scrub the comments here to benefit myself. Say what you want about me. But I simply won't allow my people to be attacked. 

The truth may be ugly, but that's what we try to stick to here. Scheming hate need not apply.

Carry on.

title: Burn v Burn
description:
It was reported in the High Court that Johnny Depp wrote of drowning and burning his ex wife Amber Heard in text messages to his fellow actor Paul Bettany. The mainstream media immediately ran with it, screaming that Depp "threatened" Heard with doing those things. 

First, those texts were private messages. Depp was frustrated with his abuser. Heard was never intended to read those, therefore, they are not a threat to her. 

Second, to state the obvious, Depp never burned or drowned Heard. In fact, in the same text, he confesses that he could never spray his rage at the woman he loves. Not only were those words never a threat in the first place, but he also asserts that he could never do such a thing. 

And finally, let's not forget that Amber Heard DID burn Johnny Depp. She put a cigarette out on his face. That's a fact. 

Let's stop focusing on something that never happened and start paying attention to what actually DID happen. 

The fact that the mainstream media refuses to report on Amber Heard's clear admissions of guilt, but jump all over Johnny Depp's frustrated texts to his friend about something that never happened display the ongoing bias against a male survivor of domestic abuse.

Right now, with the current social environment, there are victims of abuse that continue to suffer because they've got nowhere to turn.

This double standard needs to be addressed, and it needs to be rectified. That way, male survivors of domestic might feel more comfortable coming forward and seeking help.

title: Johnny Depp goes to court in London
description:
Johnny Depp appeared in England's High Court on Wednesday for a pre-trial hearing in his libel case against the Sun. Depp is is suing the tabloid and its executive editor Dan Wootton over a 2018 article which directly referred to him as a wife-beater. 

This comes ahead of his defamation case against ex-wife Amber Heard. The two cases are directly related because both involve Amber Heard accusing Depp of committing domestic violence against her, and Depp insisting that Heard was the abuser in their relationship. 

It's safe to say that the outcome of the libel suit will foreshadow and effect how the defamation trial will play out. And the results of both may very well affect whether or not Amber Heard returns as Mera in Aquaman 2. This is very likely the reason that filming was pushed back a year, to allow for the outcome of both.

Depp's case against Heard is set to proceed in August of this year.

title: IO: Whatta Guy
description:
iO Tillet-Wright's infamy extends farther than making the 911 phone call on May 21, 2016 that began the end of Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. 

Before any of that happened, "Uncle iO" outed sweet little Lily Rose Depp. Lily Rose had confided in iO about her personal proclivities, and iO took it upon himself to out her before she decided to out herself. iO wrote "I'm so proud of my baby girl @lilyrose_depp. She decided hse wanted to be in @selfevidentproject because she falls somewhere on the vast spectrum, and I couldn't be happier to welcome her to the family. She's a tiny gem of a good human. #Prouduncle #weareyou

Lily Rose handled it with grace and dignity, but I can only imagine the pain of betrayal at the hands of somebody who her family had taken in as one of their own. 

Then came iO's complicity in buddy Amber Heard's scheme to ruin Johnny depp - which failed miserably and backfired squarely in her face. 

Next, iO claimed that Johnny Depp was fired from Pirates because he missed a month of filming. That would be the month that Johnny was recuperating from Amber cutting off part of his finger, and poor Johnny contracting MRSA three times, nearly dying. 

Fact is that Johnny was dumped from Pirates one week after Heard's WaMo op-ed in which she obviously refers to being a victim of Johnny Depp's (nonexistent) abuse.

Over and over again, iO chooses to stab Johnny and his family squarely in the back, even though Johnny took iO into his home when he (iO) had nowhere else to go.

I have to wonder what life will be like for iO when his complicity in Heard's scams blow up in his face, stripping away from him any credibility he might have amassed as an author and artist. I can't imagine his future will be too bright. Once Amber Heard no longer needs him to try and bolster her losing case, iO will be dumped like everybody else that no longer serves her purpose. Then he'll not only be exposed, but he'll wear the clothes of a fool, duped and dumped. 

I'd call him another of Amber's many victims, but he jumped in with both feet and has nobody but himself to blame.

title: Amber Heard back on Instagram
description:
After a brief respite, Amber Heard is posting on Instagram again. It's a simple photo of the back of her head, with an enigmatic caption about being young. Lyrics from Running against the wind.

She's got comments turned off, probably due to the backlash she got following the release of audio tapes which reveal that she abused Johnny Depp, not the other way around. Fans flooded to her social media platforms to let her know exactly what they think of her. She tried to scrub her feed by deleting the comments she didn't like, but there were so many of them that now she's got comments disabled. 

She does, however, seem to have amassed more than a hundred thousand likes in just a few hours. The Twitterverse is speculating that the bulk of those likes comes from bots. 

In the meantime, we're waiting to see what the next play will be in the defamation case brought by Johnny Depp after Amber referred to him as her abuser in an op ed. She's subpoenaed everybody this side of the Pacific, but has yet to present any real evidence that she was ever abused.

The clock is ticking relentlessly toward August 3rd. Then the truth will come out. All of it.

title: Depp's attorney hits back against fishing expedition
description:
Johnny Depp’s lawyer claims Amber Heard‘s attorney is the one with ties to Harvey Weinstein, not Depp, after Heard filed a subpoena seeking to get the Weinstein Company to turn over details of Depp’s dealings with the disgraced Weinstein.

"Weinstein’s real association is with Roberta Kaplan herself,” Waldman said. Roberta Kaplan was formerly Harvey Weinstein's lawyer, and now represents Amber Heard. 

Kaplan and Tina Tchen, the founders of the Time’s Up Legal Defense Fund, have a client list of accused abusers and hoaxers that includes Jussie Smollett, Harvey Weinstein and Amber Heard.

“Real abuse victims deserve better self-appointed leaders than these buck-chasers,” Waldman said.

Kaplan and Tchen did not immediately respond to requests for comment on Waldman’s claims.

Depp has set forth a motion to quash Heard's request for information from the Weinstein company, stating that it's overly broad and isn't within the scope of the case.

For all appearances, Heard's request is a hail Mary attempt to smear Johnny Deep by association to Weinstein and distract attention away from the case at hand. The Defamation case against Heard for calling Depp a wife-beater when she herself is the one with a history of committing domestic violence against Depp and prior lovers.

Heard's spokesperson insists that Johnny Depp continues to try his case in the court of public opinion, while Heard looks forward to winning the case in court.

As of now, that's slated to get started on August 3rd, 2020. We'll have to see how that comes out.

title: Amber Heard desperate to tie Depp to Harvey Weinstein
description:
Amber Heard has filed a request for the Weinstein company to turn over all correspondence between Johnny Depp and Harvey Weinstein. 

Just when we think that there are no more straws for Amber Heard to grasp at, she pulls another sliver out of thin air.

This latest fishing trip is Heard's most desperate attempt yet to smear Johnny Depp by associating him with Weinstein, Hollywood's biggest pariah. If she can smear enough mud on Johnny, she thinks, I guess, that she can get a pass for abusing him.

There is a link between Johnny Depp and Harvey Weinstein, of course. The 2004 movie, 'The Libertine.' The film was promoted by the Weinstein Company. As such, there's no guarantee that the owner of the post-production promotion company ever passed words with Johnny Depp, and there's certainly no proof whatsoever that Johnny had any knowledge whatsoever of Weinstein's misdeeds. 

Perhaps we should look at Amber Heard's ties to Weinstein herself. Heard's lawyer, Roberta Kaplan used to be Harvey Weinstein's lawyer. That alone speaks volumes.

But let's not forget the largely forgettable Film 'All the Boys Love Mandy Lane' with Heard in the titular role (a hilarious comparison with Heard's real life). Harvey Weinstein's company was supposed to distribute the film, but he dropped it. That gives Heard Just as much of a chance to have had conversations with Weinstein as Johnny did, by the post-production-company field of logic.

Take a good look at that photo, folks. That's Amber Heard sitting in a booth with the aforementioned Weinstein. Why don't we find out what SHE said to him?

title: Amber Heard abusive toward her assistant
description:
Laura Divinere, an interior decorator who used to work for the couple, has gone on the record about who was abusive in the marriage and who wasn't. 

According to a deposition given by Divenere, she "worked for Johnny Depp and Amber Heard as their interior decorator in downtown LA in the Eastern Columbia Building from July 2014 to sometime in 2016. Thereafter, I worked for Amber and still do to this day. I have been and continue to consider myself a friend of Amber's. I remain in regular contact with Amber."

"I was with Amber and interacted with her frequently on the several days immediately following her abuse allegation...including at least on May 23, 24, 25. On those days, I worked with Amber, retrieved packages for her, rode elevators with her, and saw her up close and in person. On none of those days immediately following the abuse claims did I observe any signs of physical abuse or injury, including redness, swelling, cuts, bruising, or damage of any kind."

"In all of my many interactions with Amber over a period of years, she did not ever mention any allegation of violence or other abuse to me. I do not recall any allegation of violence or other abuse to me in the days following May 21. I knew and interacted with Amber's close friends Rocky Pennington, io Tillett Wright, and her sister Whitney Heard. None of them ever mentioned any accusation of violence or other abuse against Amber by Mr. Depp,"

"I witnessed Amber being verbally abusive towards her former assistant Kate, screaming at her on the phone. Her then-assistant Kate called me several times in tears, very upset, regarding the treatment she received from Amber."

Apparently, Amber Heard is an equal opportunity abuser.

title: Petition to remove Amber Heard from L'oreal
description:
There's a petition to have Amber Heard removed from being a spokesperson for L'oreal. Since the tapes came out with Amber Heard admitting that she hit Johnny Depp and body shamed him calling him fat, there's been an outcry for L'oreal to remove Amber Heard as one of the faces of L'oreal. Scores of consumers have vowed not to use any L'oreal products as long as they employ a proven and confessed serial abuser. I'm one of them.

If this is something that you feel strongly about, consider signing the petition to have Amber Heard removed from L'oreal.

title: Tara Roberts witnessed the abuse.
description:
That Brian Fella came through for us again. In a recent tweet, he describes how Tara Roberts, Johnny's Estate Manager on his island in the Bahamas since 2008, witnessed Amber Heard physically and verbally abuse Johnny Depp on his island. 

According to Roberts' deposition, "Amber repeatedly berated him with increasing ferocity. She was insulting him, calling him names, and in the middle of this onslaught, I heard her specifically say 'Your career is over.' 'No one is going to hire you.' 'You are washed up.' 'Fat.' 'You will die a lonely man.' and also screaming things that were incomprehensible."

"[Johnny] was responding to [Amber's] verbal attacks by saying 'Go away' and 'Just leave me alone.' Amber's screaming and berating rose to a fever pitch and Johnny kept saying 'Go away' and 'Leave me alone.'"

"I saw Amber lunge at Johnny, clawing, tugging, and aggressively pulling him. He continued to stand there telling her to stop and leave him alone."

That was the incident where Heard threw a can of lacquer thinner at Johnny Depp's face, leaving an open gash on the bridge of Depp's nose.

Johnny never raised his voice or pushed her back. Roberts never saw Johnny being aggressive with Heard.

HERE is Brian's twitter post. And HERE is more of Tara's deposition.

So there you have it. One more witness who saw Amber Heard savaging Johnny Depp, not the other way around. I'm sure she won't be the last.

title: Perez Hilton Apologizes to Johnny Depp
description:
When Amber Heard made domestic abuse claims against Johnny Depp, many were quick to believe her and vilify him. Among those was Perez Hilton, who was quite vocal in his support for Team Heard.

Now, Perez Hilton is apologizing to Johnny Depp for believing Amber Heard. After listening to the leaked audio where Heard admitted to hitting Johnny Depp and mocking him for being a victim, Hilton says “I really questioned her credibility, I questioned her motives, I questioned everything."

“I feel like I owe Johnny Depp another apology,” Perez goes on to say, “I want to apologize to Johnny Depp for not believing all of the other women in his life.”

You can read more about Hilton's apology, and watch his apology video HERE.

title: MeToo lawyer accused of sexual misconduct
description:
Michelle Ugenti-Rita became the face of the #MeToo movement when she accused former State Rep. Don Shooter of sexual harassment.

Now, there's a lobbyist who says the state senator and her now husband, Brian Townsend, sexually harassed her while the politician was still in the Arizona House of Representatives. Ugenti-Rita was a state representative between 2013 and 2015, meaning the alleged allegations happened before the politician made her accusations against Shooter.

The lobbyist alleges that Ugenti-Rita showed her photos of herself on her phone, and that Ugenti-Rita's husband, Townsend, sent explicit photos hif himself and his wife to the lobbyist. 

The lobbyist also alleges that she was later invited up to Ugenti-Rita's hotel room, where Ugenti-Rita behaved provocatively and urged the lobbyist stay until Townsend could join them. 

Arizona’s Senate Democratic Leader David Bradly said that the “allegations contained in the deposition appear to be a clear violation of our sexual harassment policy that warrants further investigation."

This clearly illustrates that Amber Heard is likely not the first woman to use the #MeToo movement to hide her own criminal behavior by purporting to represent women's issues. 

This outlines a fundamental problem with the #MeToo movement. While claiming to be representatives of abused women, the MeToo platform has created an environment where men can be persecuted with no proof whatsoever aside of a woman accusing him, the way Amber Heard accused her ex-husband Johnny Depp of abusing her. 

Heard presented falsified photos as proof, and she became the darling of #MeToo, furthering her own career and public reputation at the cost of a man who did none of the things she accused him of.

Heard's photos were quickly debunked as fakes by other public photos the day before, the day after, and even later the same day showing her with no bruises or busted lip at all.

Ultimately, women like this don't represent women who really have been brutalized. In fact, there's almost irreperable damage. Until this flawed system is fixed, the real victims are the women who are forced to suffer in silence for fear that they won't be believed if they come forward to tell their stories and seek help.

title: Heard still stepping out.
description:
Amber Heard is still acting like she's an A-list star, stepping out at at a pre-Oscar party with her latest gal pal, and yesterday to the Spirit Awards (solo). I'm hoping that her gal-pal had other obligations for the day, and not that she stayed home to hide any facial injuries she might have recently acquired. 

These outings have a lot of people wondering why Heard is still being invited to high-profile events after she was heard on audio tape admitting to beating her (then) husband Johnny Depp.

I speculate that she was invited to these events before that tape became public listening, and that she should enjoy them. I doubt that she'll get any more such invites. I think it's the end of the road for her.

The star of the picture, though, is the lady in black who's covering her face like the sight of Amber Heard makes her as sick as it makes me. You, madam facepalmer, are my new hero.

title: That Brian Fella
description:
There's a guy named @ThatBrianFella on twitter who also has a YouTube channel called Incredibly Average. He takes a great deal of time and puts forth a whole lot of effort putting together videos that explain in detail what's going on in the Amber Heard/Johnny Depp saga. 

Johnny himself has seen and praised Brian's efforts. That's about the highest accolade you can get.

HERE is his video about the tape that came out about a week ago where Amber Heard admits to beating Johnny Depp, insulting and gaslighting him. 

And HERE is Brian's take on the newly released audio clip, in which she dares Johnny to come out as a victim, saying that nobody will believe him because he's a  man that's bigger than her teeny tiny little 115 lb self is. She even outlines her plan to take pictures of made up bruises during the entirety of their marriage so that she can set him up.

BTW, if she weighs 115, I'll eat my hat, with my head in it. Just saying.

Brian has a whole string of videos he's made as the feud has unfolded. They're well worth the watch if you want to know the whole story. Give him a look at his YouTube channel HERE.

He and they are anything but Incredibly Average. They are superb.

title: "No one will believe you" Amber Heard taunts Johnny Depp
description:
In a newly released audio recording, Amber Heard brags that no one will believe that he's the victim of abuse because he's a big, strong man and she's a tiny little female. She says that she couldn't possibly have abused him because she's never been able to overpower him or knock him down. The judge and jury will never believe him, she asserts. 

In the same conversation, Heard lays out her dastardly plan, taunting him about having her hair and makeup done to take pictures of her alleged abuse over time, so that the time stamps would match up with her allegations. It's obvious that she's been planning his demise for a very long time. Unfortunately for her, she can't keep her mouth shut and her own words give her away. 

Johnny Depp replies 

You can read a very telling transcript HERE.

Johnny finally seems to understand what's been going on for the entirety of their marriage, that he's being set up to take a fall. He tells her, sadly, "I've loved you for so many f**king years but you know what? You didn't exist. You don't exist. You're not there. You're a f**king made up thing in my head. And I can't believe you're doing this to me." 

Incredibly, Heard's lawyers hold up this latest audio recording as proof the Johnny was the abuser, despite Heard's admissions. 

Johnny's lawyers say simply that this is a conversation any abuse victim will recognize. Her saying "No one will believe you, so you better do what I want." 

What do you think? Does Amber Heard dig herself deeper into a hole with her own words? Or does she vindicate herself as being the victim of abuse?

title: Amber Heard's laughable response to recorded evidence that she abused Johnny Depp
description:
Here's Amber Heard's reaction to the audio of her admitting that she repeatedly abused Johnny Depp. Through her lawyer, she says:

"The fact that a woman fights or talks back does not mean that she has not been the subject of repeated domestic violence or abuse. It's a myth to say, as Mr. Depp apparently is implying that, if Ms. Heard slapped him, then she can't also be a victim. That is just not true."

The argument that he was violent too might fly, except that the whole crux of her argument on the recording, the reason for the fight de jour, is that he always leaves ("splits") whenever she starts a physical altercation with him. 

Can't have it both ways, hon. You can't accuse him of abuse, but get caught on tape calling him a baby and a coward for leaving whenever you get physically violent with him. 

This reaction doesn't fly any more than the rest of her flimsy accusations. Time's up for Amber, and she's apparent'y the only one that doesn't know it, still trying desperately to seem socially relevant. 

What are your thoughts about this?

title: Recording: "I wasn't punching you, I was hitting you."
description:
Straight from the horse's mouth, Amber Heard admits that she abused Johnny Depp repeatedly. And she blames HIM for it.

From Daily Mail: "I can't promise I won't get physical again, I get so mad I lose it." Listen as Amber Heard admits to 'hitting' ex-husband Johnny Depp and throwing pots, pans and vases at Johnny Depp in explosive audio confession.

You can hear the entire recorded conversation HERE, thanks to thanks to Brian McPherson (@ThatBrianFella). 

Heard, a self-proclaimed ambassador for women's rights and outspoken domestic violence advocate, taunts Depp for fleeing the late night physical abuse rained down on him by her, telling him: "You are such a baby and coward. Grow the f**k up Johnny."

And many more admissions of abuse she inflicted upon Depp, including the comment: "I can't promise I won't get physical again."

Depp's attorney Adam Waldman says that there are a dozen more recordings just like it. It's only a matter of time before we hear them all. 

Most studio contracts contain morals clause. That's how Disney ousted Johnny Depp from Pirates. I find it impossible to imagine that Heard's contract as Mera doesn't contain a Moral's clause. Certainly, committing violent domestic abuse violates such a clause.

Amber Heard used the #metoo movement to glorify herself and frame Johnny Depp. But it looks like time's up for her.

title: Heard exploits boot with no explanation. We have one.
description:
As of yet, Amber Heard has provided no explanation for the many photos that have shown her wearing a medical boot.
In One picture, she's hamming it up on the black sands of a Hawiian beach in a flowing white dress, with the boot on full display, of course. In another photo, she makes sure to flash a lot of leg, for good measure.

I have a couple of questions about this before I provide you with what I believe is the only possible motive for the spiffy new footwear.
First, who wears heels with a medical boot?

Second, who repeatedly puts their full weight on an injured foot if the injury is so severe that it requires a boot? There are repeated pictures of her doing exactly that HERE, HERE, and HERE.

Nah. I don't buy it. In this humble petitioner's opinion, there's only one reason Amber Heard is posing for all these photo ops with that great big clunky boot on her foot: To divert attention away from texts from her parents that PROVE that she lied about Johnny Depp abusing her so that she could kick him out of his own condo and keep it for herself. Read the texts for yourself.

I'd bet real money on this whole boot show being a diversionary tactic.

title: Amber Heard's father threatens to shoot Johnny Depp, reports
description:
According to David Killackey, who worked on both Amber and Johnny‘s classic cars, Amber Heard became abusive towards him and her father made "death threats" towards Johnny Depp in a phone call to him.

Killackey says he told Amber Heard that she was going to have to pay for any work done on her car after her split with Johnny Depp. 

According to Killackey, "The reply I received what can only be described as an extremely hostile response from Amber. I did my best to convey to her that I did not wish to get in the middle of the dispute between her and Mr. Depp. She did not receive this information very well. Her first reaction was to verbally abuse me with expletives, threats and a continued rant over what she claimed was an unfortunate financial downturn of her personal finances caused by Mr. Depp. At one point she said 'you motherf---er,' you're screwing me!"

Killackey claims he then had a conversation with Amber Heard's father that turned threatening. "During the attempt to facilitate the repairs, modifications, and additions to the Mustang. I received many text messages and phone calls from Amber's father, Mr. David Heard. After the separation of Amber and Mr. Depp, Mr. Heard became very bitter towards Mr. Depp," he claimed.

In one phone call, Amber's dad stated "That f---ing piece of s--t is f---ing me too because I'm supposed to get 10% of the money and without it I can't produce the movie I was gunna make!" and "He is ruining my baby girl's career and blackballing her in Hollywood."

Further, Mr. Heard said: "and when I get to him I'm going to beat the s--t out of him" and "I'm from Texas, and men from Texas carry 45's and Johnny is going to meet the f---ing end of mine!"

Mr. Killackey’s chilling first-hand experience with Amber Heard and her family exposes the motive behind Amber Heard’s abuse hoax - money.

Mr. Heard's threats have been reported and are being taken very seriously.

title: Depp/Heard court date delayed until August
description: Originally slated for February 2020, the court date for Johnny Depp's defamation case against Amber Heard has been continued until August of 2020. Not surprising, considering all of Heard's delay tactics. But fear not, seekers of justice. The case will be heard in court, and Johnny Depp will prevail. The only question at that point will be why Australia hasn't sought charges for assault leading to serious bodily harm.

title: Heard: IME DENIED
description:
Amber heard's petition to force Johnny Depp to endure an 8 hour mental evaluation was DENIED. The court deemed the 8 hour IME to be inappropriate and not helpful. 

Thanks to Federica P on her L'oreal petition, you can read a transcript of the hearing in which AH's request for an 8 hour mental eval of JD HERE.

That's one more score in Johnny Depp's favor. More to come, I have no doubt.

Thanks to that Brian Fella for the screen grab.

title: Amber Heard in Doubt for Aquaman 2
description: The future of Amber Heard as Mera in Aquaman 2 and continued DC movies may be in doubt following Johnny Depp's 50m defamation suit, says Cosmicbook news. Likewise, netizens around the world are signing a petition to remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2. Every day brings more coverage in favor of Johnny depp, with some fans reversing their position following evidence presented to the court. In the face of logic, the truth is coming to light. With the court date coming up in February, justice looms near for Johnny Depp and his growing number of supporters.

title: They're taking notice
description:
Since the petition to remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2 passed the 30,000 signature mark, there's been a scattering of articles sparking renewed interest, including a tweet from the DCEU asking what people think. I think it's great that so many people are taking notice. Let's hope Warner Bros, DC and James Wan take notice and respond accordingly.

One thing that can't be argued: People are taking notice of our little petition, and over 33,000 people agree with it.

Are you listening Warner Bros, DC, and #jamesWan?

title: Heard demands 8 hour mental evaluation
description:
In her latest bid to smear ex husband Johnny Depp, Amber heard is now requesting that Depp undergo extensive mental health evaluation. She wants him observed while under the influence of drugs and booze she says he used when she says that he abused her. The result, I guess she thinks that'll prove that he was capable of doing all the horrible things she accused him of doing to her.

You know. All the things she did to HIM then accused him of doing to her.

Depp's fans are up in arms all over Twitter, insisting (rightfully so) that it's just a smear tactic and that she's not only bullying him, but also placing a stigma on all persons who have sought medical attention as being perpetrators of violent crimes.

Me, I'm glad she's still flying those bullying colors. All she's proving is that she continues to try to manipulate control, and damage him. In short, shes proving his case for him.

I can't wait until February. He might FINALLY shut her up.

title: Amber heard scrambles for support
description:
Johnny Depp just scored a win (and an 8 figure settlement from) his former management company. Now, Amber Heard's team seems to think that the loss will inspire his former managers to jump on board to defend her. I guess she thinks hat one desperate, bitter ex can benefit from the definitive loss of another, his ex managers. 

In a memorandum to support a request for a subpoena, Amber Heard's lawyers are asking for TMG (the ex managers) to reveal that they had knowledge that Depp violently abused Heard.

So, not only is she not denying that she (falsely) alleged violence by Depp, she keeps right on saying it. She might think she's drumming up support, but all she keeps doing is repeating the same offense. She just keeps right on defaming him. 

I can't wait until he wins and FINALLY shuts her up.

title: Elon Musk officially subpoenaed in Johnny v Amber
description:
Elon Musk has officially been subpoenaed in by Johnny Depp is his legal battle with Amber Heard. Musk is being asked to turn over all communications, including text messages, with the actress on or about the time of her alleged domestic violence incident with the actor.

According to new legal documents, obtained by The Blast, Depp filed a subpoena to Musk to produce and protect all items that are associated with Amber Heard.

I'll bet Musk is SO glad he got involved with such a shrew. His name is being dragged through the mud, and will be for years. Not that I have much sympathy for any guy that sleeps with another man's wife a month after the wedding, in the groom's bed, no less. 

Those two deserve each other. Johnny never deserved any of this.

title: Amber Heard tries to silence Johnny Depp
description:
For a woman who refuses to be silenced. Amber Heard is trying awfully hard to get Johnny Depp's defamation suit thrown out. She has now hired attorney Roberta Kaplan, who has filed a new motion to dismiss, arguing, as have many before him, that Johnny Depp’s name was never even mentioned in the op/ed in which Amber Heard describes herself as a survivor of domestic abuse. 
“In Mr. Depp’s view… Ms. Heard can never speak about the backlash she endured after reporting him, or about the death threats against her, without impliedly re-accusing him of abuse,” Kaplan writes. 
Well, duh. 
1) When Amber Heard describes herself as a survivor of domestic violence at the hands of Johnny Depp, she's committing defamation. So no. She CAN'T say it. 
2) Amber Heard and Johnny Depp both signed a divorce agreement that forbids them both from speaking negatively about each other. So, no. She CAN'T keep spewing her slanderous rhetoric. 
I'm pretty sure that Kaplan is smart enough to understand that premise, but she's a lawyer. She'll argue whatever she's paid to argue, especially in such a high-profile case.

Aside from which, is it just me, or does Amber Heard look pretty rough, lately? She looks bloated and pasty in recent photos, including this one. I wonder what's up with her.

title: Amber Heard put out a cigarette on Johnny Depp's face
description:
Photos reveal that Amber Heard put out a cigarette on Johnny Depp's face during the fight in which she chopped off his finger with a vodka bottle.

Johnny contracted MRSA three times, nearly losing his life.

Don't let that monster Amber Heard get away with it. Please sign and share the petition to remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2.

#JamesWan

title: Amber Heard: Sauce for the Goose
description:
Amber heard is complaining because the public no longer hates her ex-husband Johnny Depp. Right after their split, amid allegations of spousal abuse, Johnny's reputation took a serious hit. 

Now that Depp has been able to prove that he's the one that's been abused the whole time, his reputation is on the mend, while hers has taken a serious nose dive.

Heard's legal team is screaming "Perjury!" about Johnny Depp, saying that he clearly lied about when or how many 911 calls were made that fateful night, saying:

"“These signal an intention by Mr. Depp to litigate in the court of public opinion.”

She didn't mind the court of public opinion when it was swinging in her favor, did she? Well, too bad, babycakes. Sauce for the goose is good for the gander. If she'd been around Hollywood's A-list for more than ten minutes, she'd know that public opinion is a fickle, fickle thing. One minute, you're the darling of the media. The next, the whole world knows that you're a monster and nobody minds calling you out on it.

She'll have to get used to that. When Johnny wins his defamation case, she's not going to have anywhere to hide, no matter how many times she shows off her nipples. Little boys will oggle the view, but grownups will shun her for the monster she is. Hopefully, her only employment options will be the fabulous world of fast food, or porn. nothing in mainstream entertainment.

She'll also have to get used to being about 50 million dollars lighter. According to Celebrity Net Worth, Amber's 'only' worth about 9 million. If/when the verdict for that case swings in Johnny's favor, she'd going to have to start asking all her friends for loans to cover it. And I think she'll find herself in a very lonely place. 

Little girl's got a big lesson to learn. Here's hoping it happens sooner than later.

title: Amber Heard fires back, calls Johnny Depp a liar
description:
Amber Heard is calling Johnny Depp a liar when his legal team claims that the 911 call wasn't made when Heard's camp says it was. She has produced what she's calling evidence of TWO 911 calls made that night, at 8:30 pm and 11pm. 

But Johnny's legal team has recovered cctv footage of Johnny leaving at 8:30. So even if the earlier call WAS made when Amber says it was, it couldn't have been made in the middle of her fictional fight with Johnny, like she claims. He wasn't in the building anymore. 

Either way, she's the liar. And she just keeps right on proving it.

title: Amber Heard sucking up to the Trans crowd
description:
Amber Heard recently invited trans woman Corey Ray to attend the Cannes Film Festival, calling her L'oreal's "woman of worth."

I am angered beyond words that Amber still represents L'oreal. And the fact that she's using trans women to try and use transwomen to reinvent herself as some kind of hero representing trans persons infuriates me. 

It's not the first time Amber's used a Ray to help herself seem socially relevant. She also took Ray to the Golden Globes with her. 

Seems there's no demographic Heard's not willing to hide behind.
