There's an interesting update over on the petition to remove Amber Heard as a L'oreal spokesperson. According to their update, 

"Raquel Pennington's deposition (Amber Heard 's best friend and witness) who has never seen Johnny Depp yelling,  grabbing or hitting someone or smashing things..Staff testimony of her "bruises" seen weeks after 21st may 2016 (Johnny Depp was NOT even in the Country) when she was with Elon Musk... Officer M. Saenz testifies she has never seen broken things or smashed bottles in the apartment.... And much more.. "

It's definitely worth a read. Have a look, and sign that petition as well while you're there. Amber Heard doesn't deserve to be in Aquaman 2, and no serial abuser deserves to be a spokesperson for a company geared toward serving women. 
#JamesWan
#Loreal
#Aquaman
#Aquaman2

title: Amber Heard admits to abusing Johnny Depp
description:
Amber Heard admits that she threw a can of paint thinner at Johnny Depp's head in front of witnesses on the island. 

What more proof do we need that she's guilty of domestic abuse? What more does Warner Bros DC need to fire her? 

If it was a male actor that admitted to abusing his wife, he would have been canned and panned long since. And yet, Amber Heard still hasn't been dumped for Aquaman 2. It's a sexist double standard that must not be tolerated. 

Make some noise, people. Let WB DC know that domestic abuse will not be tolerated!

title: Amber Heard begs for support
description:
Amber heard threw another pity-party recently, trying to make herself the victim again by saying that the media is to blame for her recent fall from grace. If women are political, she insists, they'll lose followers.

Then she says that we should give "all men a 9 p.m. curfew to rein them in." Because, sure. That'll happen. 

What, I wonder, would the public's opinion be if men called for a curfew to "rein" women in? There would be one hell of an uproar about sexism. 

That's what gets me about Amber Heard. She commits all sorts of offenses that seem to slide under the radar because she's a woman, and she's pretty. If any man did the things she pulls, they'd have their chan yanked back faster than you can blink. 

After that little sexist display, she begged the audience to back her up, telling them to "“So lose the followers [who disagree], you’ll get a lot more!”

I guess she's promising that if people disassociate themselves with anybody that dares to have an opinion that opposes hers, they'll be rewarded by acceptance by what I guess she sees as her own personal army of butt-kissers.

Sorry, but it doesn't work that way. If somebody's deserving of support, they don't have to beg for it. And, if they have all these "a lot more!" supporters, again, they wouldn't need to beg for them.

No. It sounds like she's desperate, attending as many events as possible trying to stay relevant, and begging for support because hers is waning. The more evidence Johnny Depp releases, the worse she looks. The more evidence she "leaks" the more she shoots herself in the foot.

title: Samantha McMillen's testimony against Amber Heard
description:
“On December 16, 2015, I spent much of the day and evening with Amber Heard, preparing her to appear on the James Corden show. I saw her throughout the day of December 16, 2015, in good light, at close range, wearing no makeup. Throughout the day of December 16, 2015, I could see clearly that Amber Heard did not have any visible marks, bruises, cuts, or injuries to her face or any other part of her body. She appeared as a guest on the James Corden show that day. After the show, Ms. Heard said to me ‘can you believe I just did that show with two black eyes?’ Ms. Heard did not have any black eyes, and had been visibly uninjured throughout the day and at that moment. I later learned that Ms. Heard had accused Johnny Depp, in court filings and the media, of violently abusing her the previous night, December 15, 2015.”

Heard lied about that beating and every other incident. She was clearly framing Johnny the whole time they were together. I'm willing to bet that she only hung in there long enough to get him to put a ring on it so she could divorce him and get half his fortune.

title: Johnny Depp reads letters from Hunter S. Thompson
description: If you're a good guy, you deserve good friends. And Johnny's one of the best. Enjoy listening to Johnny read letters from his good friend Hunter S. Thompson, HERE.

title: Johnny Depp is expected to return as Gellert Grindelwald
description:
There's a ton of speculation that Johnny Depp will not return to the Fantastic Beasts franchise. But the fact is that he's already contracted, and is fully expected to return. So all those headlines are just to get hits and sell papers, as it were. 

Amber Heard, on the other hand, only has 2 projects on her dance card, and one of those is Aquaman 2. Let's keep letting WB know that we, the ticket-buying public, do not want a known abuser in the role. They can do so much better.

title: Johnny Depp won't back down
description:
With Amber Heard's stylist testifying that Amber Heard didn't have two black eyes she accued Johnny Depp of giving her, Depp is more determined than ever to debunk the rest of Heard's hoaxes. Depp is determined not to back down until his name is cleared of her accusations. 

Heard's accusations about the night of May 21, 2016, the night she said that Johnny gave her those fake bruises has already been proven to be a hoax, by 2 police officers, dozens of witnesses, and more than 80 hours of video surveillance. It never happened. 

Now, Depp is debunking the rest of them, too, one by one. New subpoenas have been issued, and the entire matter is headed straight to court. It'll be a long battle, with months and months passing between each motion, each step, and every filing, but the outcome is clear. 

Amber Heard lied.

title: Stylist: "Amber Heard had NO injuries" after multiple allegations of abuse.
description:
Star stylist Samantha McMillen testified that she has never seen any injuries on Amber Heard, accordint to THE BLAST.

Joynny Depp’s legal team obtained testimony of celebrity stylist, Samantha McMillen. McMillen has helped style Heard for “major events” since 2014.

Specifically, she describes styling the star for an appearance on “The Late Late Show with James Corden” on December 16, 2015, after the actress alleged Depp had given her two black eyes during an argument that occurred the previous night.

“Throughout the day of December 16, 2015, I could see clearly that Amber Heard did not have any visible marks, bruises, cuts, or injuries to her face or any other part of her body,” McMillen testified.

When describing those facial injuries, McMillen said, “Ms. Heard did not have any black eyes, and had been visibly uninjured throughout the day and at that moment.”

The stylist also gave testimony about working with Heard on May 24, 2016 … the day allegedly brutal fight that Heard recounted during her emotional deposition.

McMillen said she showed up to the house around noon and “she came to me at the bottom of the staircase in Mr. Depp’s house and gave me a hug, sobbing.”

The stylist was adamant Heard had no marks on her face during their meeting on May 24, but admitted, “Three days after my encounter with Ms. Heard, on May 27, 2016, I saw in the media that Ms. Heard had gone to Court with prominent injuries visible on her face. I knew that she did not have those marks on her face May 24, 2016 when I was with her.”

Funny how that works.

title: Amber Heard - The pot calling the kettle back
description:
Amber Heard is firing back at Johnny Depp, accusing him of getting her blacklisted in Hollywood following their split. The allegations come by way of Depp's former lawyers, who are also being sued by Depp for mismanaging his affairs and bilking him out of tens of millions of dollars. 

So, Depp's ex-wife, who falsely accuses him of domestic abuse against her, is running around screaming that Depp tried to ruin her in Hollywood, despite the fact that she's been running her mouth about HIM ever since their divorce almost 3 years ago.

To back her up are accusations from Depp's ex-lawyers, who are trying just as hard as Amber Heard is to smear Depp because he's suing them to get back the money they wrung out of him.

Sounds legit.

title: New Amber Heard Victims step forward.
description:
"We are now interviewing OTHER WOMEN WHO HAVE COME FORWARD CLAIMING THEY ARE VICTIMS OF HORRIFIC ACTS OF VIOLENCE and other abuse AT THE HANDS OF AMBER HEARD..."

She accuses him of domestic violence and his previous partners say what a nice guy he is. 

He sets the record straight and says that she abused him, and her previous partners step forward to say that she abused them, too.

Funny how that works

title: Surveillance proof - see the video
description:
Johnny Depp has amassed a wealth of evidene against Amber Heard, proving that she didn't have any marks on her face following what she described as a violent attack, including witnesses and video surveillance from the building they lived in at the time. 

You can see video footage from the building HERE

You can see Amber Heard and her co-conspirators, her sister and her BFF Raquel Pennington getting on and off the elevator at the condo building. And Amber doesn't have a mark on her.

What will she come up with next?

title: Elon Musk to testify
description:
In an interesting turn of events, Tesla billionaire Elon Musk has been subpoenaed to testify against his former girlfriend Amber Heard, ex wife of Johnny Depp. In his $50 million dollar defamation suit, Johnny Depp stated that Must began visiting Heard in Depp's condo late at night while he (Depp) was away filming, just one month after his (Depp's) marriage to Heard. And now, Elon is going to have to answer to that, in front of a judge, under oath, risking penalty of perjory. Keeping in mind that Johnny's condo has security cameras all OVER the place, and can tell the real story of when Musk came and went. Pun fully intended.

No doubt Amber was a tasty piece of tail, but I just have to wonder if it was worth the public relations nightmare she drags to every life she touches.

And, not for nothing, but doesn't it look like Musk is sporting a shiner in that photo? What do you think the odds are that she gave it to him?

title: Amber Heard continues to insist that she was the victim
description:
And so, according to Heard, were her friends and family.

She got physical with (ex husband) Johnny Depp to defend herself. And to defend her"Baby sister" - who she says Johnny was about to push down the stairs, getting physical only after Johnny "laid his hands on her, to prevent what could have been a FATAL injury!" The best answer she gave is "I don't know what I did."

In video testimoney, Heard is asked a yes or no question: Have you ever hit Johnny Depp with a closed hand or fist? In response, Heard launches into yet another horryfying episode of graphic abuse at the hands of her "monster" ex husband. 

And Heard is visibly upset when the person that asked the question reminded her that it's a yes or no question, jutting our her jaw in that angry, defiant way she has when she's not happy. Which is a lot.

"Have you ever punched your husband?" She tried to waffle with her answer and refused to use either the words "yes" or "no" - instead insisting that "whatever" she did was in defense of herself or another. 

We're never going to get the truth out of this spoiled, selfish piece of work. The best we can hope for is that the judge sees through her nonsense and rules in Johnny's favor. 

And, as ever, we can hope that Warner Bros DC removes Amber Heard from Aquaman 2.

title: Johnny Depp staying busy
description:
The wheels of justice grind steadily forward. Johnny Depp is quietly gearing up to present his case against ex wife Amber Heard, having submitted 87 videos suppoerting his accusation that Heard abused him.

The suit itself is for defamation, but make no mistake, there's a lot more at stake. as a reult of this case, the world will get the verdict on who, eactly, was the abuser in the case, and who was the victim.

The ramifications for the #MeToo movement are far-reaching, too. By making herself the darling of #MeToo and domestic abuse victims, Heard has now made it even more difficult for real victims to come forward. If she lied, there's nothing stopping the media from saying that they did, too. She has single-handedly set domestic abuse victims back a hundred years. 

In the meantime, Johnny is steadily filming the next Fantastic Beasts movie and working with his band, The Hollywood Vampires. Amber is steadily dating. 

And, hopefully, Warner Bros DC are busy looking for the actress they'll replace Heard with for Aquaman 2. 

Keep signing the petition, folks. Let them know that we, the ticket-buying public, don't want a serial abuser in the DC universe.

title: Four years until Aquaman 2
description:
According to Forbes, Aquaman 2 will likely have a release date of December 16, 2022, four years after the first Aquaman splashed onto the big screen.Why the wait? Simply put: the competition. From the looks of it, December 2022 is the first Christmas season between now and then that won't have a big-ticket studio release. Specifically: Avatar.

Besides that, James Wan is a busy guy, slated to work first on his "Trench" horror flick - which Jason Momoa and Amber Heard are both reportedly attached to. 

As horrific as the thought of Amber Heard alongside Jason Momoa in yet another film, the way for Aquaman 2 is good news. It gives plenty of time for Johnny Depp's defamation suit to hit the courts. When, not if, it's proven in a court of law that Amber Heard violently abused her ex husband - same as she did her ex wife - it should be pretty clear to those in charge of the DCU why she should be left out of it. 

Fingers crossed!

title: Amber Turd
description:
In court papers filed recently, Johnny Depp accused Amber Heard and her pals of deliberately soiling the sheets of his bed the night of Amber Heard's 30th birthday because she was angry that he arrived home late.

Heard says that her tiny teacup Yorkie made the mess.

The housekeeper that found the pile of poop testified that the "evidence" was too big to have come from such a small animal.

A source close to Depp claims that there might be “strong, photographic evidence that connected Amber to the feces” that might turn up in the course of the upcoming proceedings.

The hostilities between Heard and Depp keep getting messier by the minute, literally and figuratively. And, the longer it goes on, the worse Amber looks. 

And, from the sound of it, she didn't smell too fresh, either.

title: The True Face of Amber Heard
description:
Watch this segment from the tv show Overhaulin' - when they redid Amber Heard's vintage Mustang. Begining at :30 seconds in, Heard is pissy, petulant, abrasive and insulting. Watch her body language and gestures to everybody around her, flipping them off and being aggressive. Until she learns that she's on television, and then it's all smiles and mugging it up. 

Then watch at 1:15 when she physically assaullts both her father and Johnny Depp, like it's cute or okay because she's a pretty girl.

Just look at how she looks at Johnny, like she's saying "You'd better not say the wrong thing, mister."

That, my friends, is the real Amber Heard, on display for the whole world to see. That's what Johnny lived with. I'm just shocked that he took it as long as he did.

title: How an almost severed finger made the world fall in love with Johnny Depp again
description:
Meaww.com has published an article about how Johnny Depp's nearly severed finger has turned the public's opinion of him back into a favorable one.

Thanks to Amber Heard's manipulation of the #MeToo movement and accusations that Johnny Depp was a domestic abuser, a lot of people 'canceled' him. They were quick to believe Heard amid the #MeToo media storm that was felling giants around us. 

But then Depp produced photos of himself with a bruised face and a nearly severed finger, accusing Amber Heard of being the "perpetrator of domestic abuse, not the victim." 

Fans the world over have flocked back to Johnny Depp's side, eating their words and seeking atonement for being so quick to believe the accusations against him. 

By making herself the darling of the #MeToo movement, Heard made it even harder for real victims of abuse to come forward. If one woman can lie about being abused, all claims of domestic abuse can now be viewed with doubt. Heard has not supported victims of domestic abuse, she has done them a huge disservice.

Heard's "evidence" against Depp was wan and dubious, while his proof seems insurmountable. The verdict isn't in yet, but the tide of public opinion is just about unanimous, in favor of Depp.

There are over 11,000 signatures on the petition to remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2, so it looks like a lot of people agree.

title: Depp gets a legal victory!
description:
Johnny Depp was handed a legal win on Tuesday 08/17/2021 when a Virginia judge refused to dismiss his $50 million defamation lawsuit against ex-wife Amber Heard. Sanctions were however, denied.

This is a great win for Johnny Depp, however, there’s still no word as to when, or if, Minamata movie will be released in the US. Johnny Depp & the victims of Minamata deserve to have this movie, and it’s incredibly important story released! 

Please take the time to share this on your socials, and ask others to sign and share as well! Thank you so much for your time and support thus far, and as we continue forward!

I wanted to stop by to post an update— we are 5 signatures away from 1,300, and counting! You guys are truly, truly incredible. I know I thanked the JFJD community, but I also know that there are others who genuinely want to see the movie to truly understand the crimes that happened to the people of Minamata. We cannot let them bury this, and silence those that suffered Minamata disease, some of whom are STILL SUFFERING! 

I believe we can hit 1,500 by the end of the day. That’s the goal I’d like to set for us, anyway. The more signatures we get, the bigger the likelihood of MGM seeing our plea to release Minamata in the US, but we need your help to accomplish this. Can you please help me in sharing this petition with 10 people today? It would mean so much!!

Thank you all in advance, and we will touch base again soon ����

#JusticeForMinamata #JusticeForJohnnyDepp #ReleaseMinamataMovie

By the way, Johnny Depp--you're looking AMAZING, love!  Thanks for all you do, and you EARNED that award for Rhonda's Kiss!  :)  Keep that Love Alive.

description: Johnny Depp has some seriously awesome supporters, who KNOW how to discern truth from lies.  As a man who is incapable of being anything but HONEST and REAL, he certainly attracts people who see beyond the surface like he does.  Thank you all so much! :)

title: 128 People Supported Fantastic Beasts and Johnny Depp!  Now, I'm Going to Go for MORE Signatures
description:
In twenty-four hours, I've reached my goal of getting 128 people to sign my petition, Support JK Rowling's Fantastic Beasts--Remove Ugly Slur on Johnny Depp!   However, wonderful as that accomplishment is, we need a lot more supporters to gain even better leverage on this very real issue. Johnny Depp was accused of something he did not do. He may not have done any prison time, but he may as well be a prisoner of the label inflicted upon him. "Domestic Abuser," is what blindsided Harry Potter fans on Twitter are calling him.  Those outraged by the idea of Johnny Depp having anything to do with Harry Potter, a story that promotes anti-bullying and awareness of domestic violence towards children, etc...they NEED to know that this man is INNOCENT. Johnny  Depp knew, like so many others, that the West Memphis Three were innocent. He campaigned passionately for them along with Patti Smith, Eddie Vedder and others.  However, even after all was said and done, the Three were released from prison, ONLY if they pleaded guilty to murders they never committed!  Now, they will wear that stigma on their characters for years, unless they can somehow re-open the case and prove themselves innocent.  Johnny Depp had to have gone through intense agony this past summer, although he hid it well with a brave face.  It may not be desirable to him to re-open the case and prove Amber Heard a liar...although he was prepared with 23 witnesses for the upcoming trial in August.  However?  Amber Heard is a master at what she set out to do to him. She, having lived with and known him for four years, knew how to push  Johnny Depp's buttons.  It was malicious.  Once Amber learned of all the ammunition  Johnny had gathered for his defense, she wasted no time putting out that video of Johnny cursing and banging around inanimate objects while drunk. She denied putting the video out, but that was just a cover up.  No one who saw that video didn't cringe when they saw Johnny Depp really angry, and not in character.  They took that video and assumed the worst. However, the camera filming the video was BEHIND  Amber Heard, not held in her hand.  Why else would we see her?  What we hear at the end of the video which may sound like a scuffle and perhaps  Amber being thrown to the floor--is actually Johnny ripping the hidden camera out of the wall. What else would it be?  He gestures to Amber's hand holding the remote to the camera.  But he did not grab the remote. He went right for the camera.

The final straw for Depp was the picture of the severed finger, and the message he "supposedly" wrote on a mirror that indicated Amber Heard had been unfaithful to Johnny with Billy Bob Thornton.  

NOBODY took into consideration that despite  Johnny's dipping his gushing finger in paint...that mirror would be spattered with blood and the message would never have been legible.  Why didn't anyone consider that? 

The horrific anguish which I have been through myself, that women have suffered in domestically violent relationships with men caused emotions to run high when Depp was accused.  Emotions alone and not sense ruled those supporting Amber in the social media trial.  As emotional as I got, however,I also made sure to look carefully at all the clear evidence on both sides.  Once I learned what was really going on, I went to town on social media.

But we will not bring Johnny Depp peace by fighting and mud-slinging with each other. We need to show support and promote awareness of Domestic Violence against ALL humans.  We need to NOT lessen the importance of stopping REAL Abuse Against Women--but we can't forget that all men are not perpetrators and misogynists.  Johnny Depp isn't just one more "white male celebrity who can get away with hitting his wife and still work."  This is not about that.  Johnny Depp is INNOCENT.  Mel Gibson and other male celebrities who were proven guilty are having trouble getting back to work. Johnny Depp is INNOCENT.   We can't allow him to be lumped in with those who actually DID hurt their girlfriends/wives.

Let's stand strong against violence,  lies, bullying and ALL forms of abuse!  Let's remember that all celebrities are not conceited misogynists who don't care about anybody but themselves. Johnny Depp has always been real, upfront and has always spoken his Truth. Everyone who meets him or watches an interview with him knows how GENUINELY kind and good he truly is. It's not an act. No one who works with Johnny doesn't know that, no one who loves him doesn't know that.

Stereotypes, Blindsidedness, bias towards ONE gender who gets domestically violated, stops here.

I will keep going until I get a million signatures if I can. :)

Thank you ALL for your wonderful support!!!

title: Update #1
description:
Just wanted to let everybody know that as of right now there is no set amount of signatures we need to reach. The “goal” amount is set automatically by change.org and keeps changing each time that goal is reached.

So far, I haven’t heard back from any of the organizations, and they haven’t told me that we need a certain amount of signatures either. For now, let’s see if we can reach 5,000 signatures. The ideal amount, if we still haven’t heard back yet, would be 100,000, because I’m sure they would pay attention then. For now, keeping sharing the petition and the link, and keep trying to contact these organizations through email or social media sites (please be courteous when contacting them [ex. don’t insult or use swear words]). And thank you to all who have already signed and shared! I will update as needed.

title: Amber Heard is an advocate and Save Women's Lives
description:
Thank you for the support of Amber Heard and to Save women's lives by letting them speak against domestic abuse. Let's make it more acceptable than being told that our 'life has too much drama.' We should make it acceptable to stop abuse of women everywhere and at all levels.

Why is it that when a stranger harms a woman, it causes more of an outcry like Sarah Everard than when it's in their own home or by a partner?
Many countries though won't even have any outcries over strangers killing women either. Why not outcry long before?
We don't need it to get to that point. It should be before any of that and we should focus on helping female victims long before anything happens.

Your life matters. It should be seen as heroic to speak against abuse and violence of all kinds, especially for other people.

title: Petitions in support of Johnny
description:

title: Victory!
description:
Finally, the news that we have been waiting for so long!
And thank you all for your support! Let us have a little, but still very important! Congratulations to Johnny and all of us!

Johnny Depp returns as Gellert Grindelwald in the third instalment of Harry Potter spin-off franchise Fantastic Beasts along with Eddie Redmayne as Newt Scamander, Katherine Waterston as Tina Goldstein, Dan Fogler as Jacob Kowalski and, of course, Jude Law as the young Albus Dumbledore. Director and longtime J.K. Rowling collaborator David Yates is also confirmed, making this film his seventh in the Harry Potter world. Filming begins in 2020 and Backstage can take an educated guess that casting director Fiona Weir will soon be confirmed as attached and casting now.

description:

Knowing his love and affection for her, you can try to imagine what his emotional state was! In deep grief and mourning! Even if that were the type of outbreaks of aggression, everything is easily debited to the state of affect. And in April-May, he probably wanted to spend time next to his mother, and not this all since the pile of shit on the bed and everything that happened after ... And the fact that Amber-gang became active at this particular time leads to different thoughts. And Heard describes  as a soulless, heartless creature, not capable of a gram of sympathy (which is normal even strangers are capable of), but only putting shit in the literal and figurative sense ... “He has a couple of movies filmed, preparing for release, and is about to sign onto to reprise his role in the third installment of Fantastic Beasts,” the source tells HollywoodLife.com. “He is not dating anyone, but instead, healing and moving on from the Amber drama while letting his lawyers fight on his behalf and restore his reputation in Hollywood. While Johnny continues to rock out, his legal team is pursuing the $50 million defamation lawsuit he filed in March 2019 – and they won’t give up until he gets what he wants. “Johnny’s legal team will not relent unless Amber issues a full retraction and an apology,” the source tells HollywoodLife.com. “This is the only solution which will satisfy Johnny and his legal team. Otherwise they will see this case through.”

Amen! Amen! Amen!

title: Abuse and gender roles
description:
I planned this post 2 weeks ago, but more important topics appeared. Today, I think, it is time.
Let's look at what is abuse and talk a little about gender roles. To make it a little clearer. I began to read psychological articles on this topic, and I really did not like one thing! Most articles emphasize that a man is a rapist, a woman is a victim. Absolutely stereotypical thinking in our time, when stereotypes are crumbling everywhere. If we are talking about equality, then not only equality of rights, but also equality of responsibility! And I think Johnny suffers in part from this stereotypical thinking too! And with certain efforts, the “Depp case” could be a precedent for the protection of male victims!
Why it happens? Yes, probably men are mostly physically stronger (although not always!). But an abuse (as it is written in those articles) is not only physical violence, but also moral, emotional, psychological ... And this is already the "power" of women. Tell me, who better get the brain out?;) The answer is unequivocal, with a few exceptions.
In addition, because of these same stereotypes, men find it harder to fight. Potential victims are most likely brought up so that you can not raise a hand against a woman. And if he answer, then what will happen? Public opinion will say "AAA, he is a scoundrel, he beats women!!!" And now he find yourself guilty. Secondly, it is difficult to tell someone, complain. They will be called a wimp and a rag. Also so-so pleasure. It remains to endure and be silent, increasingly destroying his personality. Only in a truly equal society should all cases be treated in the same way and everyone should be entitled to protection.

So what are the signs of an abuse?
Constant quibbles to the smallest shortcomings (the fact that ideals do not exist in principle are completely ignored), jealousy, bans on communication with family and friends, total control, humiliation and disrespect for values ​​and needs (I can, but you don’t). The unpredictability of punishments. It is very difficult to understand what you are doing wrong. From this the feeling of guilt and inferiority is fixed in the victim. And the alternation of periods of violence with periods of peace, when it seems that everything is finally adjusted. And the abuser gives it all as a concern for a partner, so at the beginning of a relationship it can be difficult to figure out where you are. And this is a big danger.
(And now look at Amber and her relationship with Johnny, and you will see all this. Google to help). For illustration - one of her fresh photos. Eloquently enough

title: Dates and limits
description:
Hello! Today 2 news!
1. Not "yes", but not "no", so we believe and hope that Johnny, and not someone else, will show us the power of Grindelwald!;)

Warner Bros. announced the third “Fantastic Beasts” film will hit theaters on Nov. 12, 2021. Production on the movie is expected to begin in spring of 2020. Wait a long time, but we will wait!
Full news: https://variety.com/2019/film/box-office/fantastic-beasts-3-release-date-1203200115/

2. Johnny is ready to fight to the end to clear his name!

“His response to her latest motion to dismiss (transfer venue) is due on Monday, May 20, after which Amber’s reply will then be due May 31.
Johnny will lay out proof of his allegations that Amber and her friends carried out a series of abuse hoaxes targeting him. With no hearing date yet set, and a series of motion victories behind him, he has already put a lot of time and energy into clearing his name from her nasty allegations.”

“As long as it takes, Johnny will use the courts to carry out justice until his name in Hollywood is cleared and his reputation is restored. She harmed him a lot back when he wasn’t defending himself; now he recognizes he must engage fully in this legal battle until her allegations are totally disproven. Johnny is not going to get trampled on any longer.”

Adam Waldman: “Before the evidence fully reveals this previously arrested, violent abuser’s latest charade, here is a question: what actual abuse victim presents an easily disprovable hoax to the court to obtain a temporary restraining order when they claim to possess other real evidence of abuse,” Johnny’s attorney continued. “That Amber Heard is allowed to pretend none of this is happening, and glide from one ‘philanthropic’ photo op to the next, is a grotesque insult to the pain and experiences of real abuse victims of every gender.”

Full text: https://hollywoodlife.com/2019/04/28/johnny-depp-not-backing-down-legal-battle-amber-heard/

title: News of the week
description:
Hi, loyal! Thank you for being there, but we need more people! Please remind the petition and familiar and unfamiliar!
Today about the current.
Earlier this week, it was announced that Amber Heard stylist Samantha McMillen testified in court that in the days when Johnny allegedly severely beat Amber (December 15, 2015 and May 24, 2016), there were no signs of violence on her! These are very important readings! And after a couple of days, suddenly everyone starts writing about a Johnny's new girl. And it is replicated everywhere, unlike the information about the court! Accident? I do not think! Most likely - conscious stuffing and provocation from those who are very afraid of losing! Therefore, it is simply necessary not to pay attention to this, not to participate in the "yellow" discussions, not to be distracted from the main thing! Naturally wanting Johnny happiness, good luck and prosperity.

And a little comment by Alice Cooper on Johnny's lyrics on the new Hollywood Vampires album:

"I think [Johnny] wrote a lot of songs on this album that are [to] get back at people," Cooper tells Ultimate Classic Rock in a new interview. "[The album's first single] 'Who's Laughing Now' is him going, 'Okay, you've set out everything you can do to destroy me, who's laughing now? I'm still here. And I'm making these records and I'm still going to make movies and I'm still a better actor than most of the people out there. Who's laughing now?' There's two or three songs like that on the album that I'm singing and going, 'Wow, I'm the voice of Johnny's anger. [Laughs] Normally, I'm writing songs that concern me. Now, I'm sort of the mouthpiece for Johnny, which is great."

title: Gave poisonous treats to the innocent priest (C)
description:
Happy Easter, who celebrates!
Thank you for already more than 120 votes!
Today I want to speculate a little.
I was very hooked by the phrase from the new Hollywood vampires song "Who's Laughing Now", which I put in the headline. (If suddenly someone does not know, this is the band in which Johnny plays the guitar).
Without taking a direct meaning now, but a little about something else ... Johnny is an actor from God! He is not a performer, he is a Creator, an Artist! He does not do only what is written in the script, and what the director wants, he changes, processes, thinks out ... He makes the character live, not cardboard. And for the attentive viewer in his roles there is always a thought, a meaning, a message...
And such a person has recently been trying to extinguish. Constantly diverting his attention to the courts and the prosecution, one is more ridiculous than the other. This is real sabotage! To distract from filming, blocking roles and already finished films (as happened with the City of Lies)... Not to give the Message... This is much more serious than if it were only for him, it is a crime against culture and world cinema, deicide (also the word from the song).
Let it sound loud, but it's true, Johnny Depp is already in the gold fund, no matter what happens next, but I really want him to do a lot more so that we have Grindelwald and many others. So that the creator could create!

title: Fog everywhere
description:
Thanks to those 75 people who are currently subscribed! Attract your friends and acquaintances, please! Let as much as possible Deppheads know about it.

Some news. But first we need to remember the old omen "a thief often shouts first: "hold the thief!""

In the trial Depp with his former lawyers from the firm Bloom Hergott about financial differences, suddenly appeared the topic Amber Heard. Bloom Hergott suddenly wanted to ask former Warner Bros. chairman Kevin Tsujihara did Johnny ask him to remove Heard from Aquaman and blacklist at the studio or not.

Depp’s attorney, Adam Waldman, tells The Blast, “The Hollywood Reporter story alleging Johnny Depp attempted to ‘blacklist’ Amber Heard from Aquaman is a last-ditch effort by defendants to smear Mr. Depp using an evidence-free media and clickbait. It is merely the latest false assertion, anonymously injected into the media by defendants being sued by Johnny Depp for tens of millions of dollars, purposed to save their skins and delay a looming day of reckoning in a court of law.” Waldman claims that not only did Depp not try and have Heard fired from “Aquaman,” it’s really the other way around. He says, “Grotesquely, the truth is the opposite of their latest "blacklist allegation": according to the New York Post, "senior executives at Warner Bros.," who are the company’s #Metoo leadership and personally close with Amber Heard, claimed a week ago that Warner Bros. would throw Johnny Depp off the "Fantastic Beasts" movie franchise in which he stars because of Ms. Heard’s abuse hoax, notwithstanding that it has been thoroughly disproven by police and other sworn testimony, photographs, audio tape and 87 surveillance videos. Ms. Heard has herself previously been arrested and incarcerated for domestic violence.”

Yes, Mr. Waldman, we really hope so!

!!!"These matters will be determined by the Court, not the Hollywood Reporter, nor by People Magazine, whose employee conspired with Ms. Heard to put her hoax on its cover. Mr. Depp will have his days in courts; these lies will never survive the disinfecting sunlight of evidence.”!!!
